dṛḍho me bhāv sthiro me bhava āhāryo me bhava apratihāryo me bhava sarvakarmasu ca me cittaśreyaḥ kuru ha ha ha ha hūṃ //
athāsminn uccāritamātre sakalatraidhātukatribhuvanajanasaṃniveśasya vajrakrodhaterittirimudrā pāṇibhyām āviśya bandhato dṛḍhībhūteti //

atha vajrapāṇir yāthāvat praveśayitvā, sarvamahāmaṇḍalaṃ yathānupūrvato darśayitvā, vajraratnābhiṣekair abhiṣicya, vajracihnāni ca karebhyo dattvā, vajranāmābhiṣekair abhiṣicya, sarvatathāgatasarvārthatāyāṃ sthāpayām āsa //
tatas trailokyādhipatīnāṃ sarvadevīnāṃ vajraratnābhiṣekeṇābhiṣicya, svacihnāni vajrāṇy adhiṣthāya, vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhiṣicya, sarvatathāgatasattvārthatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayām āsa //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas teṣāṃ sarvapraviṣṭānāṃ buddhajñānāni niṣpādya, sarvamudrābandhāni śikṣayitvā, vajrasamayāny anuprādād anena śapathahṛdayena //
mā vo jīvitanāśāya bhaveta samayo hy ayam iti //
ayaṃ vaḥ samayo hanyād yadi kaścid atikramet /
yas tu kruddho nirīkṣena stheyaṃ tasya puras tathā //
vajrarākṣāṃ dṛḍhāṃ baddhvā vajrabandhaṃ tu pīḍayet /
yas tu kaścit paritrārthaṃ bandhet krodhasamanvitaḥ /
rakṣāyai yasya sattvasya sthātavyaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhataḥ //
yas tu samāhitaḥ kruddhaḥ prayuñjyāt samayo hy ayam /
tasya yuṣmābhiḥ purataḥ stheyaṃ sattvāgrasiddhaya iti //
parivartya lalāṭe tu sthāpya yas tu samāhvayet /
tasya stheyaṃ puraḥ śaśvad yadi jīvitum icchati //
oṃ vajrapātāla bhañja bhañja huṃ phaṭ //

div.ab: atha bhagavān vajrapāṇir bhagavantam etad avocat/

lg.l: ahaṃ, bhagavan, sarvatathāgatair duṣṭdamaka ity abhiṣktaḥ/
tat sādhv ājñāpayaiṣāṃ sarvaduṣṭamaṇḍalabandhānāṃ kathaṃ pratipadyāmi //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvaparitrāṇārtham idaṃ sarvamaṇḍalākarṣaṇahṛdayam abhāṣat //
oṃ vajrasamayākarṣaya sarvamaṇḍalān vajradharasatyaṃ mātikrama huṃ phaṭ //
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre sarvamaṇḍalāni sarvataḥ sumerugirimūrdhni bāhyataḥ parivāryāvasthitāni //
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇis tān sarvamaṇḍalasaṃniveśān āhūyaivam āha/
vayaṃ, bhagavan, māṃsāhārā duṣṭasattvatayaujuohāreṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayāmaḥ, tad ājñāpayatu bhagavān katham asmābhir jīvitavyam iti //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imaṃ duṣṭavajrakrodham abhāṣat //
oṃ duṣṭavajrakrodha hana daha paca vidhvaṃsaya vikira sarvaduṣṭasamayamudrāmaṇḍalān bhañja bhañja marda marda khāda khāda paramantrān vajrasamayahuṃ phaṭ //
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre sarvaduṣṭamaṇḍalāny ekadhyībhūtvānekāni vidhvaṃsitāni vikīrṇāni /
te ca duṣṭasamayasattvā dahyamānāḥ pacyamānā mahānto mahārauravārtān ravān muñcanto, yena bhagavān mahāvajradharas, tenāñjalayo baddhvaivam āhuḥ/
paritrāyasva, bhagavan, yena vayaṃ prāṇān na parityajāmaḥ //
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar api bhagavantam etad avocat /:
ājñāpayasva, bhagavan, kathaṃ eṣāṃ duṣṭamaṇḍalānāṃ pratipadyāmi //
oṃ niśumbha hana daha paca gṛhṇa bandha huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imaṃ vajrakrūrakrodham abhāṣat //
oṃ mahāvajrakrūrakrodha pātaya sarvaduṣṭamaṇḍalān, vināśaya sarvaduṣṭasamayān, vikira vidhvaṃsaya visphoṭaya
bhañjaya sarvaduṣṭasamayamudrābandhān, gṛhṇa hana daha paca sarvaduṣṭasamayasattvān, vajrasamaya huṃ phaṭ //
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre tāni sarvaduṣṭasamayamudrāmaṇḍalāni punar apy ekadhyībhūtvā mahāsāgare prapatitānīti //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api bhagavantam etad avocat/
tad eṣāṃ ḍākinīgrahādīnāṃ sarvagrahāṇāṃ kathaṃ pratipadyāmi //
oṃ hana hana vajra huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api sarvaḍākinyādiduṣṭagrahākarṣaṇahṛdayam abhāṣat/
oṃ vajrākarṣaya śīghraṃ sarvaduṣṭagrahān vajradharasatyena huṃ jaḥ //
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre ḍākinyādayaḥ sarvaduṣṭagrahāḥ sumerugirimūrdhni bāhyato maṇḍalībhūtvāvasthitā iti //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas tān ḍākinyādīn sarvaduṣṭagrahān āhūyaivam āha/
pratipadyata, mārṣāḥ, prāṇātipātavairamaṇyaśikṣāsamayasaṃvare māvo vajreṇādīptena pradīptenaikajvālībhūtena kulāni nirdahyeham //
atha te ḍākinyādayaḥ sarvaduṣṭagrahā, yena bhagavān, te nāñjaliṃ baddhvā bhagavantaṃ vijñāpayām āsuḥ/
pratipadyasva, vajrapāṇa, eṣāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākaruṇām utpādyopāyaṃ dātum iti //
atha vajrapāṇir mahākāruṇika idaṃ sarvasattvamaraṇanimittajñānamudrāhṛdayam abhāṣat //
oṃ vajra pratigṛhṇa hṛdayam ākarṣaya yady ayaṃ sattvo māsād ardhena mriyate tad asya hṛdayaṃ niṣkramatu samaya hūṃ jjaḥ //
vajrāṅgulimukhābhyāṃ tu svakakṣau tu samutkuṣed iti //
anayā mudrayā bhavadbhiḥ sarvasattvahṛdayāny apakṛṣya bhoktavyānīti //
atha te ḍākinyādayaḥ sarvaduṣṭagrahā hulu hulu prakṣveḍitāni kṛtvā svabhavanaṃ gatā iti //
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ punar api bhagavantam etad avocat/
ahaṃ bhagavadbhiḥ sarvatathāgataiḥ sarvaduṣṭadamaka iti kṛtvādhīṣṭaḥ/
tad ājñāpayatu me bhagavān jvarādīnāṃ vyādhīnāṃ kiṃ karomi //
oṃ vajrasamayānaya sarvaduṣṭajvarādīn nāśaya huṃ phaṭ //
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre jvaradayaḥ sarve sumerugirimūrdhni bāhyataḥ parivāryāvathitā abhūvan //
atha vajrapāṇis tān jvarādīn āhūyaivam āha/
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva idaṃ svakarmaviśuddhijñānamudrāhṛdayam udajahāra/
oṃ vajrakarma viśodhaya sarvāvaraṇāni buddhasatyena samaya hūṃ //
iyaṃ mudrā yasya jvarādisarvavyādhispṛṣṭasya karmato darśayet /
atha ta evam astv iti kṛtvā prakrāntā iti //

div.ab: atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatān evam āha/

lg.l: tad ājñāpayantu me bhagavantaḥ eṣāṃ narakādīnāṃ sarvāpāyānāṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyam iti //
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre rauravamahārauravādayaḥ sarvāpāyasaṃniveśāḥ sumerugirimūrdhni bāhyataḥ parivāryāvasthitāḥ //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas tān apāyabhūmipratitān sarvasattvān āhūyaivam āha/
eṣa vayaṃ buddhaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ tvāṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gacchāma iti //
eṣa vayaṃ buddhaṃ dharmaṃ saṅhaṃ tvāṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gacchāma iti //
oṃ vajrapāṇi visphoṭaya sarvāpāyabandhanāni pramokṣaya sarvāpāyagatibhyaḥ sarvasattvān sarvatathāgatavajrasamaya traṭ //
atha te tryāpāyagaticakrāntarasthitāḥ sarvasattvā vajrapāṇisakāśād imāṃ mudrāṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvadurgatibhyaś cyutgvā bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūla upapannāḥ/
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api bhagavantam etad avocat: /
ahaṃ bhagavann aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuparitrāṇasarvahitasukhānubhavanārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatatvottamasiddhiphalāvāptihetoḥ sarvatathāgatasiddhivajraṃ dattvā, sarvatathāgatair adhīṣṭaḥ/
tat sādhv ājñāpayantu me bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatā athaiṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ kiṃ karomīti //
atha sarvatathāgatā punaḥ samājam āgamyedam avocan/
oṃ vajrapāṇimahāmaṇḍalaṃ praveśaya sarvān duṣṭaraudrān nivāraya pāpebhyaḥ pramokṣaya durdṛṣṭiparyāpannān viśodhaya nāśaya vināśaya ha ha ha ha hūṃ //

div.ab: atha vajrapāṇiḥ sarvatathāgatājñāvacanam upaśrutyāśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuparitrāṇasarvahitasukhottamasiddhinimittaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatajñānābhijñāvāptiphalahetor

lg.l: idaṃ sarvatathāgatamahāvajrasamayabhūtaṃ trilokavijayaṃ nāma mahāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //
sūtrayen maṇḍalaṃ tatra sūtraṃ raṅaiḥ prapūrayet //
jvālāmadhye likhed ratnaṃ padmaṃ viśvāyudhaṃ tathā //
evaṃ vajradhātvādiṣu sarvamaṇḍaleṣu sūtram ākramya sarvato gacched iti //
manasotkṣipya rekhāṃ tu vajrasūtram athāpi vā /
praviśan niṣkraman vāpi trasyate samayān na sa iti //
oṃ vajratuṣṭikrodha sādhu sādhu hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrabhṛkuṭikrodha hara hara huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrasūryamahājvālāmālakrodha jvālya sarvaṃ huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrāṭṭahāsakrodha haḥ haḥ haḥ haḥ huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajradharmakrodha vināśaya viśodhaya huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajratīkṣṇakrodha cchinda cchinda huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrahetukrodha praviśa praveṣaya maṇḍalaṃ sarvān huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrakrodhabhāṣa vada vada huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrakavacakrodha rakṣa rakṣa huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrayakṣakrodha khāda khāda huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrakrodhamuṣṭi sādhaya samaya huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajragīte gāda gāda hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrapāśakrodha praveśaya sarvasamayān huṃ hūṃ //
oṃ vajrasphoṭamahākrodha bandha bandha sarvasamayān huṃ vaṃ //
tatrādita eva tāvat samayaṃ vajrācārya eva vajrakrodhaterittirimudrāṃ baddhvā praviśet //
ahaṃ, bhagavantas tathāgatāḥ, krodhavaśaṃ yāsyāmi, nigrahītavyān nigrahīṣyāmi, saṃgrahītavyān saṃgrahīṣyāmi //
tan me bhagavanta ājñāṃ dadatu kathaṃ pratipadyāmi
iti kṛtvā, vajrakrodhaterittirimudrāṃ svahṛdayaṃ yathāvat sthāpya, vajrāṅkuśādibhiḥ karmāṇi kṛtvā, punaḥ sarvasamayamudrāṃ bandhayet //
tato guhyapūjācatuṣṭayaṃ kṛtvā, tathā dhūpādibhiś ca /
svayaṃ vajrācāryo vajrakrodhaterittirimudrāṃ baddhvā, praveśayed anena mantreṇa //
oṃ vajra samayaṃ praviśāmi śiṣyāya bandhayed anena hṛdayena/

div.ab: tato nīlavastrottarīyanīloṣṇīṣāvabaddhaśirā nīlanaktakena mukhaṃ baddhvā, praveśayed anena mantreṇa/

lg.l: tataḥ praveśya vajrāveśasamayamudrayāsyāveśam utpādayed anena hṛdayena/
tato yathāvan mukhabandhaṃ muktā mahāmaṇḍalaṃ darśayet/
sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānāc ca vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ satatānubaddhaḥ svakīyāḥ siddhir dadāti //
tato 'sya vajrābhiṣekeṇābhiṣicya, tīkṣṇasvavajracihnaṃ yathāvat pāṇibhyāṃ dātavyam anena mantreṇa/
oṃ vajrakrodha tvām abhiṣiñcāmi vajranāmābhiṣekatah, he vajranāma //
tato yasya yan nāma kuryāt, tasya heśabdaḥ prayoktavya iti //
vajraratnaṃ lalāṭe tu samālikhya tathaiva ca /
liṅgam ākramya tenaiva devān samākarṣed dhruvam //
oṃ vajrakrodhāsanāgacchākarṣayāmi te vajrasamayam anusmara huṃ phaṭ //
hṛdayaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvam apy ānayed dhurvam //
manasā varmayet kāyam ātmanas tu parasya vā /
mahākavacayogena rakṣet sarvam idaṃ jagad iti //
oṃ vajravidyottamamahākrodhānaya ho bhagavan vajra huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrakrodhadṛṣṭi hana daha paca vināśaya huṃkāreṇa pātaya vajrasamaya huṃ phaṭ //
saṃlapan mahatā vācā ṭakki huṃ phaṭ sakṛd vadet /
yasya yasya tu sattvasya so so maraṇam āpnuyāt //
manasā mārayāmīti vajraṃ hṛdi tu bhāvayet /
huṃkāreṇaiva sarveṣāṃ mudrayaty abhitaḥ svayam iti //
yasya sattvasya yenaiva manasā mudrayaty asau /
ābhir mudrābhir atyarthaṃ sarvakarmāṇi sādhayed iti //
ekaikayā tu mudrayā caturṣu karmasu catvāri mudrāhṛdayāni prayuñjed iti //
cummbaṃs tu daśanair oṣṭhaṃ gṛhya huṃkārayogataḥ /
huṃ kāraṃ yaḥ prayuñjīta sukhaṃ tv anubhavann asau /
huṃkāraṃ yaḥ prayuñjīta sarvāṅgena tu pīḍayan /
yas tu sattva hitārthāya sa tu buddhatvam āpnuyāt //
maheśvaram umāṃ caiva bhūmau likhya tathaikramet /
rāgayet krodharāgā tu sādhukrodhā tu tuṣṭidā //
dharmakrodhā hared dharmāṃś chided vai krodhavajrayā /
hetukrodhā hared duḥkhān vāg gharet krodhabhāṣayā //
karmakrodhā sukarmāṇi kuryād rakṣāṃ tu rakṣayā /
dvyagrā saṃsthā bhṛkuṭyāṃ tu hṛdi sūryāgramaṇḍalā /
dharmamudrās tu tā eva huṃkāraiḥ sahitā punaḥ //
yasya yasyāstu mudrā yā yad yat pārśvaṃ tu karmataḥ /
tatra tatra tu vai veṣṭya tāṃ tāṃ mudrāṃ prayojayet //
vāmapādena taṃ sattvaṃ māsād ardhena sidhyati //
yasya vai sattvakāyaṃ tu samāviṣṭas tu tāḍayet //
vajramudrādvikaṃ baddhvā kavacas tvaṃ parasya vā /
granthanaṃ tarjanībhyāṃ tu rakṣā bhavati śāśvatī //
bhaumānāṃ samayo hy eṣa sarvakṛd duratikramaḥ //
ākarṣayan susaṃkruddho grahān sarvān vaśaṃ nayet //
vajrāgryābhyāṃ svakakṣau tu kuśaṃs tu hṛdayaṃ haret //
sūtraṃ tu dhārayet paścād yathāvatsūtraṃ smṛtam //
krodhadṛṣṭyā tu saṃkruddhaḥ sarvakarmāṇi sādhayed iti //

div.ab: krodhaguhyamudrāmaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ

lg.l: atha bhagavān punar api vajradhāraṇīsamayasaṃbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
oṃ sarvavajriṇi vajramāta ānaya sarvaṃ vajrasatyena huṃ jjaḥ //

div.ab: athāsyāṃ bhāṣitamātrāyām vajrapāṇihṛdayāt sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇir vajrapāṇisadṛśasarvātmabhāvāḥ samantajvālāgarbhā vajrakrodhasamayamudrādevatā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya, sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatārthān

lg.l: niṣpādya, bhagavato vajrasattvasya guhyabhāryātāpracchādanārthaṃ kāyavākcittavajramudrābimbāni bhūtvā, bhagavato vairocanasya trilokavijayamahāmaṇḍalayogena candramaṇḍalāśritā bhūtvedam udānam udānayinsuḥ //
yat tathāgatasaukhyārthaṃ bhāryātvam api kurvata iti //
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar api svakulasamayamudrāmaṇḍalaṃ vajrasamayaguhyaṃ nāmābhāṣāt //
buddhasya krodhasamayān yathāvat tu likhed buddhaḥ //
tatra madhye likhet tiryakśūle vajraṃ pratiṣṭhitam //
vajraṃ vajrāṅkuśaṃ caiva vāṇaṃ tuṣṭiṃ tathaiva ca //
vajraṃ bhṛkuṭimadhye tu vajraṃ sūrye tathā dhvajam /
dantapaṅkutiṃ tathā vajre tasya pārśveṣu saṃlikhet //
jvālāmadhye likhet padmaṃ khaḍgaṃ cakraṃ tathaiva ca /
vajrajihvāṃ yathāvat tu tasya pārśveṣu sarvadā //
triyagvajre likhed vajraṃ vṛtaṃ vajrair mahāprabhaiḥ //
koṇeṣu bāhyasaṃstheṣu yathāvat tu likhen nayam /
oṃ vajraroṣe kāmavajriṇi vaśaṃ ma ānaya jhiḥ //
oṃ vajrajvālāmālāprabhe mahākrodhāgni jvālaya sarvaṃ raviroṣe jiḥ //
oṃ vajradhvajāgrakeyūramahākrodhe dehi me sarvārthaṃ jiḥ //
oṃ vajrāṭṭahāsini hasa hasāṭṭāṭṭahāsena māraya jiḥ //
oṃ vajraśuddhakrodhe hana māraya duṣṭān diḥ //
oṃ tīkṣṇakrodhe vicchinda vajra^kośena sarvān diḥ //
oṃ vajrahetumahākrodhe praviśa cakraṃ praveśaya sarvān diḥ //
oṃ vajrajihve mahākrodhabhāṣe vacāṃ muñca diḥ //
oṃ sarvamukhe karmavajriṇi mahākrodhe kuru sarvaṃ hniḥ //
oṃ vajracaṇḍakrodhe mahāyakṣiṇi vajradaṃṣṭrākarālabhīṣaṇe bhīṣāpaya hniḥ //
tatrādita eva tāvat trilokavijayamahāmaṇḍalapraveśavidhinā praviśya, vajraṃ gṛhya, vajrakulasamayamudrāpratimudropamudrājñānamudrābhiḥ vajradharapūjārthaṃ nṛtyopahāraḥ kartavya iti //
tatrādita eva vajradhātusaṃgrahahṛdayaṃ vajragītena gāyan, sarvatathāgatānāṃ sotropahāraṃ kṛtvā, vajrācāryeṇa sattvavajrimudrā sphoṭayitavyā /
tatas tu nṛtyavidhivat tena krodhāṅkuśena tu /
muktvā mudrāṃ yathāvidhi tālayā caiva bandhayet //
tuṣṭaḥ san sarvakāryāṇi sādhayed rucitaḥ kṣaṇāt //
tathaiva nṛtyan vāmāṃ tu gṛhya dakṣiṇamuṣṭinā /
tathaiva nṛtyan sūryaṃ tu parivartaṃ samāhvayet /
vaśitvāc ca sutejastvād dānād dhāsāc ca toṣayet //
tathaiva nṛtyaṃś chinded vai vajrakośena nāyakān /
gāyan vai vajravācā tu pūjayed vajrapāṇinam /
kṛtvā caturvidhāṃ pūjāṃ mudrāṃ muñced yathā vidhīti //
vajraṃ gṛhya tu pāṇibhyāṃ sphoṭayet kruddhamānasaḥ /
yasya nāmnā tu hṛdayaṃ sphuṭet tasya janasya hi //
adhoṣṭhaṃ daśanair gṛhya yasya nāmnā tu pīḍayet /
śiras tasya sphuṭec chīghraṃ yady ājñāṃ samatikramet //
nirīkṣan yasya nāmnā tu sphuṭete tasya cākṣiṇī //
pīḍayed vajrabandhena tasya cītaṃ parisphuṭed iti //
parivartya smitasthā tu samāgryā kuṭmalā tathā //
hṛdisthā ed. hṛdi sthā valitā pārśve vāṇākarṣā tu vāmata.uh /
hṛdayāc ca samudvāntā bhṛkutiḥ parivartya vai //
yathāsthāneṣu ed. yathā sthāneṣu saṃstheyā krodhadṛṣṭyā suroṣavān iti // //
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatavajrakulasamādhijñānamudrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imaṃ trilokavijayasūkṣmavajravidyottamam abhāṣat //
atha vajranetra bodhisattva imaṃ trilokavijayasūkṣmavajravidyottamam abhāṣat //
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva imaṃ trilokavijayasūkṣmavajravidyottamam abhāṣat //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api svakulam utpādya, vajradhātumahāmaṇdalayogena saṃniveśyaitāni svahṛdayāny abhāṣat //
oṃ sūkṣmavajrabhṛkuṭikrodha hara hara hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ sūkṣmavajradhvajāgrakrodha sarvārthān me prayaccha śīghraṃ hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrasūkṣmakrodha ha ha ha ha hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ sūkṣmavajracchedakrodha cchinda bhinda hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ sūkṣmavajrakrodhamahācakra cchinda pātaya śiraḥ praviśya hṛdayaṃ bhinda hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ sūkṣmavajrahūṃkārakrodha hana pātaya vāṅmātreṇa hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ sūkṣmavajrakarmakrodha sarvakarmakaro bhava sarvakāryāṇi sādhaya hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrasūkṣmakavacakrodha rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ sūkṣmavajrayakṣakrodha hana bhakṣaya sarvaduṣṭān cintitamātreṇa vajradaṃṣṭra hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ sūkṣmavajramuṣṭikrodha bandha bandha hūṃ phaṭ //
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar apīdaṃ vajrakulasūkṣmajñānasamayamaṇḍalam udājahāra //
tasya madhye likhed buddhaṃ jñānavajrasya madhyagam //
buddhasya sarvapārśveṣu mudrās tā eva saṃlikhet /
adya tvaṃ sarvatathāgatavajrakrodhatāyāṃ vajrapāṇinā bhagavatā niṣicyase/

tat sādhu pratipadyasvāśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuparitrāṇaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatahitasukhottamasiddhyavāptiphalahetor vajrakrodhaḥ sarvasattvān api saṃśodhananimittaṃ mārayituṃ kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaduṣṭān iti //
tataḥ sarvamaṇḍalaṃ darśayitvā, vajraṃ or tad vajraṃ yathāvat pāṇau dattvā,
huṃkāraṃ yojayed yasya tasya naśyati jīvitam //
yāvantaṃ spharate taṃ tu tāvan naśyaty asau ripuḥ //
spharayet krodhavān yāvat tāvat sarvān vināśayet //
tathaiva saṃharet saṃ tu yāvad iccheta yogavān /
sarvaṃ vāpi hi niḥśeṣaṃ punar dadyāt tu jīvitam iti //
vairaṃ tu yasya sattvasya sahabhūtvā mahādṛḍham /
adharmā yadi vā dharmā prakṛtyā tu prabhāsvarāḥ /
evaṃ tu bhāvayan sattvān hūṃkāreṇa tu nāśayet //
durdurūṭā hi ye sattvā buddhabodhāv abhājanāḥ /
teṣāṃ tu śodhanārthāya hūṃkāreṇa tu nāśayet //
vajrabimbaṃ samālikhya manasā yasya kasya cit /
pātayed gṛhamadhye tu tasya tan naśyate kulam //
tad rājyaṃ vividhair doṣai rājñaiva saha naśyati //
pātayed yatra rājye tu tad rājyaṃ naśyate dhruvam iti //
bhāvayan svayam ātmānaṃ pated yatra patet sa tu //
candre vajraṃ svam ātmānaṃ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā /
pated yatra susaṃkruddhas tat kulaṃ patati kṣaṇāt //
vajrapāṇiṃ svam ātmānaṃ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā /
pated yatra hi taṃ deśam acirād vipraṇaṅkṣayate //
buddhabimbaṃ svam ātmānaṃ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā /
pated yatra tu tad rājyam acireṇaiva naśyatīti //
yasya nāmnā sa mriyate saṃveṣṭan vajrahuṃkṛtaḥ //
nirīkṣann andhatām yāti maraṇaṃ vā nigacchati //
bhagena tu praviṣṭo vai manasā yasya kasya cit /
hṛdayākarṣaṇād yāti vaśaṃ svaṃ vā yam asya veti //
oṃ vajrasūkṣmavajraśvāsa viṣaṃ pātaya huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajradṛṣṭi viṣaṃ nāśaya huṃ phaṭ //
huṃ hṛdayākarṣaṇakrodha praviśa kāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ chinda bhindākaḍḍhākaḍḍha phaṭ //
vajrakrodhān svam ātmānaṃ bhāvayan sidhyati kṣaṇād iti //
phaṭ śaṭ maṭ saṭ raṭ raṭ dhṛt haṭ paṭ traṭ kaṭ bhaṭ kṛṭ riṭ khaṭ vaṭ cieti/
atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatavajrakarmasamayasaṃbhavādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṃ svavidhyottamām abhāṣat //
oṃ sarvatathāgatadharmadhātuspharaṇamahāpūjākarmavidhivistarasamaye trilokavijayaṃkari sarvaduṣṭān dāmaya vajriṇi hūṃ //
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajranetro bodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //:

div.ab: atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api svakulapūjāvidhivistaradevatāḥ svahṛdayād utpādya, sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatākarṣaṇa, vaśīkaraṇānurāgaṇa, sarvakarmasiddhikāryakaraṇatāsaṃniyojanādīni

lg.l: sarvatathāgatarddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā, punar api bhagavato vairocanasya, vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalayogena candramaṇḍalāny āśrityāvasthitā iti //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva idaṃ vajrakarmasamayavidhivistarakarmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat //
teṣāṃ sarveṣu pārśveṣu mahāsattvā niveśayed iti //
oṃ vajrayakṣiṇi māraya vajradaṃṣṭrayā bhinda hṛdayam amukasya huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrakarmamuṣṭi sidhya sidhya huṃ phaṭ //
athātra karmamaṇḍale yathāvad vidhivistaraṃ kṛtvā, vajrakulakarmajñānāny utpādayet //
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālya tu hutāśanam /
taṇḍulāṃs tu juhvan nityaṃ gṛhapuṣṭir bhaved dhruvam //
samidbhir madhuraiś cāpi vahniṃ prajvālya paṇḍitaḥ /
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālya tu hutāśanam /
kuśapravālāṃs teilena juhvan rakṣā tu śāśvatam iti //
agniṃ prajvālya kuñjais tu kaṇṭakair eti karṣitaḥ //
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṃ suroṣavān /
raktapuṣpān phalān vāpi juhvan rāgayate jagat //
samidbhis tais tu saṃkruddho hy agniṃ prajvālya yogavān /
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṃ samāhitaḥ /
juhet tiktaphalaṃ krodhān mārim utpādayet kṣaṇāt //
samidbhir amlaiḥ prajvālya kruddho hutabhujaṃ budhaḥ /
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṃ samāhitaḥ /
samidbhis tādṛśair eva prajvālya tu hutāśanam /
kāṇḍāny adṛśyapuṣpānāṃ juhvan rucyā na dṛśyate //
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṃ samāhitaḥ /
vajripuṣpāñ juhet kruddho vajram ājñākaraṃ bhavet //
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṃ suroṣavān /
yasya śaure juhen mālyaṃ so 'py ājñākaratāṃ vrajet //
samidbhis tais tu saṃkruddhaḥ prajvālyāgniṃ samāhitaḥ /
vajrapāṇer juhen mālyaṃ so 'py ājñākaratāṃ jvajet //
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṃ suroṣitaḥ /
cīvarāṇi juhed buddho yāty ājñākaratāṃ kṣaṇāt //
priyayā tu striyā sārdhaṃ saṃvasaṃs tu bhage 'ñjanam /
prakṣipya ghaṭṭayet tatra tenāñjyākṣi vaśaṃ nayet //
manaḥśilāṃ bhage viddhvā vajrabandhena tāṃ pidhet /
caturvidhair nimittais tu siddhiś cāpi caturvidhā //
rocanāṃ tu bhage sthāpya guhyamuṣṭyā nipīḍayet //
kuṅkumaṃ tu bhage viddhvā tad bhagaṃ satavvajrayā /
chāditaṃ jvalate tat tu bhaved vajradharopama iti //
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatavajrasamayamudrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imāṃ svavajrasamayamudrām abhāṣat //
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imāṃ svaratnasamayamudrām abhāṣat //
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svadharmasamayamudrām abhāṣat //
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svakarmasamayamudrām abhāṣat //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar apīdaṃ trilokavijayacaturmudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //
trilokavijayādyās tu likhed buddhasya sarvata iti //

div.ab: athātra caturmudrāmaṇḍale mahāmaṇḍalayogenākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṃ kṛtvā praveśya,

lg.l: uccārayan striyā sārdhaṃ saṃvasan siddhir āpyate //
pravartayan striyaṃ kāntāṃ paricumbaṃs tu sidhyati //

tato yathāvad vajrakrāntitriśūlamudrādyāḥ catasraḥ samayamudrāḥ savidhivistarāḥ śikṣayitvānena caturmudrāprayogeṇa vajravādyatūryatālān niryātya, vajrasattvasaṃgrahahṛdayagītiṃ gāyatā mudrāpratimudropamudrājñānamudrābhir nṛtyopahārāpūjā kāryeti //
tathaiva nṛtyan vāmāṃ tu gṛhya dakṣiṇamuṣṭinā /
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar apīmaṃ svavajrasamayakrodham abhāṣat //
tasya madhye likhet samyag vajriṇaṃ candramaṇḍalam //

div.ab: athātra guhyamaṇḍale sarvasiddhividhivistaraṃ kṛtvā,

lg.l: sādhayet tu bhage viddhvā sarvakarmasu sidhyati
yathā maṇḍala evaṃ paṭādiṣu likhitānāṃ sarvapratimāsv api sāmānyā siddhir iti //
adhitiṣṭhata, bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatā mamedaṃ kulaṃ, yena sarvasattvā yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā sarvasiddhīḥ prāpnuyur iti //
atha bhagavataḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamyāsya trilokavijayakalpasyādhiṣṭhānāyedam ūcuḥ //
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratyāna sādhu te /
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe //
atha bhagavantḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punar api samājam āpadya jānann eva vajrapāṇiṃ mahābodhisattvam evam āhuḥ /
pratiapdyasva, vatsa, sarvatathāgatājñākāritāyā imaṃ maheśvarakāyam ataḥ svapādatalād moktum iti //
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇis tāṃs tathāgatān evam āha //
ahaṃ bhagavadbhiḥ sarvaduṣṭadamakaḥ krodha ity abhiṣiktaḥ /
tan mayāyaṃ vyāpāditaḥ. tat katham asya mokṣyāmīti //
atha sarvatathāgatā maheśvarasya sarvatrilokādhipateḥ śarīrasya jīvitasaṃjananahetor idaṃ mṛtavijñānākarṣaṇahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayebhyo niśceruḥ //
athāsmin āptamātre bhagavān bhasmeśvaranirghoṣatathāgato bhasmacchannalokadhātor āgatvā maheśvarakāyaṃ praviṣṭvedam udānam udānayām āsa //
yo mṛto 'pi hi kāyo 'yaṃ jīvadhūtatvam āgata iti //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva idaṃ pādotkṣepaṇaṃ nāma hṛdayam udājahāra //
parivartya tayor vajraṃ tam adhogāt samuddhared iti //
harṣite parivartā tu or haste paribhraman vajre vajrādhonayam uddhared iti // or 'dho mūrdhe gāṃ samuddhared iti //
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre mahāvajradharapādamūlān mahādevo muktaḥ svayam ajānāt // tato 'yaṃ maheśvarakāyo 'nena tatathāgatena pratijīvam or sañīvam adhitiṣṭhāya,
svayauva or yuvarājyatāyām atraiva lokadhātau sarvasattvārthaṃ sarvaduṣṭavinayārthaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāpitavān iti //
atha tato vajrapāṇicaraṇatalād imāṃ cajdrapādāṃ nāma sarvatathāgatabodhicittamudrāṃ niścacāra //
athāsyāṃ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ tata eva pādatālāc candrottara eva tathāgato viniḥsṛtya maheśvaramūrdhavajrapāṇicaraṇākrānta pādena candrārdhikakrānto bhūtvā vāmapārśve saṃsthitaḥ //
atha sarvatathāgatair vajrapāṇimitratve pāṇau or pāṇibhyāṃ) vajrajñānaṃ vadhvā (or vajraśūlaṃ dattvā vajravidyottamo vajravidyottama iti vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ //
atha vajravidyottamo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tena vajraśūlenālātacakraparivartanatayā nṛtyopahārapūjāṃ kurvann idam udānam udānayām āsa //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas tato vajrakrodhasamādher vyutthāya bhagavantam etad avocad //
ahaṃ, bhagavan, sarvatathāgatair vajraṃ pāṇibhyāṃ dattvā vajrapāṇitvenābhiṣiktaḥ//
tad eṣāṃ devādīnāṃ bāhyavajrakulānām asmin trilokavijayamahāmaṇḍale sthānaviniyogaṃ kariṣyāmi, yena te sattvā avaivartikā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhāv iti //
atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha idaṃ tathāgatoṣṇīṣam udājahāra //

athāsmin bhāṣitamātre sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇir anekavarṇā raśmayo bhūtvā sarvalokadhātavo 'vabhāsya, punar api bhagavato vajrapāṇer cūḍāntare sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣayogataḥ saṃgamya pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
atha tatas tejorāśita idaṃ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣaṃ niścacāra //
oṃ namaḥ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīśatejorāśi anavalokitamūrdha hūṃ dhaka vidhaka dara vidara huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajrapāṇir bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svavidyottamam udājahāra //
tataḥ punar api vajrapāṇiḥ svahṛdayād idaṃ hṛdayam udājahāra //
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //
oṃ svabhāvaśuddhavajrapadma śodhaya sarvān vidyottama huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajravośvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //
oṃ vajrakarmottama vajradhara samayam anusmara śumbha niśumbhākarṣaya praveśayāveśaya bandhaya samayaṃ grāhaya sarvakarmāṇi me kuru mahāsattva huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajravidyottamo bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svahṛdayaṃ bhagavato vajrapāṇeḥ pādavandanīyaṃ niryātayām āsa //
oṃ śumbha niśumbha vajravidyottama huṃ phaṭ //
atha krodhavajro vidyārājo bhagavataś caraṇayor nipatyedaṃ svahṛdayam adāt //
atha māyāvajro vidyārāja idaṃ svahṛdayam abhāṣat //
oṃ vajramāya vidarśaya sarvaṃ huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajragaṇṭa raṇa raṇa huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajrakuṇḍalir vajrakrodho bhagavate vajrapāṇaya idaṃ svahṛdayaṃ pādavandanīyaṃ niryātayām āsa //
oṃ vajrakuṇḍalimahāvajrakrodha gṛhṇa daha paca vidhvaṃsaya vajreṇa mūrdhānaṃ sphālaya bhinda hṛdayaṃ vajrakrodha huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajraprabho vajrakrodha idaṃ svahṛdayam adāt://
oṃ vajraprabha māraya saumyakrodha hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajradaṇḍa tāḍaya sarvaduṣṭān mahākrodha huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajrapiṅgalo vajrakrodha idaṃ svahṛdayam adāt //
oṃ vajrapiṅgala bhīṣaya sarvaduṣṭān bhīmakrodha huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajraśauṇḍo gaṇapatir bhagavate vajrapāṇaya idaṃ svahṛdayaṃ niryātayati sma //
oṃ vajraśauṇḍamahāgaṇapati rakṣa sarvaduṣṭebhyo vajradharājñāṃ pālaya huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajramālagaṇapate mālayākarṣaya praveśayāveśaya bandhaya vaśīkuru māraya huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajravijaya vijayaṃ kuru mahāgaṇapati huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajramusalo vajradūta idaṃ svahṛdayaṃ vajrapāṇaye niryātayām āsa //
oṃ vajramusalo kuṭṭa kuṭṭa sarvaduṣṭān vajradūta huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrānalamahādūta jvālaya sarvaṃ bhasmīkuru sarvaduṣṭān huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrabhairavavajradūta bhakṣaya sarvaduṣṭān mahāyakṣa huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajrāṅkuśo vajraceṭa idaṃ svahṛdayaṃ bhagavate vajrapāṇaye niryātayām āsa //
oṃ vajrāṅkuśākarṣaya sarvaṃ mahāceṭa huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrakāla mahāmṛtyum utpādaya huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajravināyakāsya vighnaṃ kuru huṃ phaṭ//
atha nāgavajra idaṃ svahṛdayaṃ bhagavate vajrapāṇaye pādavandanīyaṃ niryātayām āsa //
oṃ nāgavajrānaya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktālaṃkārādīni sarvopakaraṇāni vajradhara samayam anusmarākaḍḍha gṛhṇa bandha hara hara prāṇān mahāceṭa huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva idaṃ sarvavajrakulākarṣanasamayam udājahāra //
maṇḍalasya tu madhye vai viddhvā khadirakīlakam /
tatas tu sūtraṃ dviguṇaṃ kṛtvā tena prasūtrayet //
oṃ vajrakīla kīlaya sarvavighnān bandha hūṃ phaṭ //
bāhyatas tasya niṣkramya dviguṇaṃ tu tathaiva ca //
tatas tu sūtraṇaṃ tat tu raṅgaiḥ śuddhais tu pūrayet /
vāmavajramahāmuṣṭyā prāg rekhāṃ tu tato yathāsukham //
oṃ vajrodghāṭanasamaya praviṣa śīghraṃ smara vajrasamaya huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ śumbha niśumbha huṃ gṛhṇa gṛhṇa huṃ gṛh.āpaya huṃ ānaya ho bhagavan vajra huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajradṛṣṭikrodha dṛṣṭyā māraya huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajraviśvakrodha kuru sarvaṃ viśvarūpatayā sādhaya hūṃ phaṭ //
vajravega iti khyātas tena rekhāṃ samākramed iti //
vajradvāreṣu sarveṣu dvārapālās ta eva tu /
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvad vidhivistaram iti //

div.ab: athātra trilokacakramahāmaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādikarma kṛtvā, svayaṃ vajrācāryo vajrakrodhaterittirimudrāṃ baddhvaivaṃ brūyād

lg.l: tat tvayā na kasya cid vaktavyam/
mā te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālakriyayā nakarapatanaṃ syād iti //
ayaṃ vajrakrodhasamayas te saṃdahet kulam, mūrdhād ārabhya kāyaṃ tu nāśayed yady atikramet, samayaṃ bhandhaya //
oṃ sarvatathāgatavajradhara gṛhṇa bandha samaya huṃ //
mudreyaṃ karmasamayā ^vajrabandhāpi or bandheti kīrtitā or sarvakarmāgrakartṛtā //, rather vajradhārīti or dhāry api kaīrtitā//
oṃ vajrābhiṣekābhiṣiñca vajradharatve samaya gra gra //
tato naktakena mukhaṃ baddhvā praveśayet śiṣyān anena hṛdayena //
oṃ praviśa vajra praveśaya vajrāviśa vajrādhitiṣṭha vajra hūṃ //
tataḥ praveśya puṣpāṇi k.epayed anena hṛdayena //
tato mukhabandhaṃ muktvā maṇḍalaṃ yathānupūrvato darśayet //
na cāsya vaktavyaṃ kiṃ devā iti //
santi sattvā mithyādṛṣṭayo ye na śraddhāsyanti kim etad amoghaṃ buddhānām bhagavatāṃ jñānaṃ yathā tathāgatā vajrakule vajrapāṇinābhiṣiktās tathāgatā eveti samayaḥ //
anyatra ye devabhaktās teṣāṃ śathāhṛdayaṃ dattvā vācyam iti //
tato vajraratnacihnamālābhiṣekaṃ dattvā, karmavajraṃ pāṇibhyām abhiprayacchya, vajranāma kuryāt /
hṛdy aṅguṣṭhamukhānāṃ tu bandhanād dhṛdayā smṛtā //
tām eva mūrdhād ārabhya bhraman kāyāgramaṇḍalā /
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi sādhanaṃ karma eva ca //
yasya sattvasya yā mudrā bhavet tasya svam ātmanā /
bhāvayaṃs taṃ svam ātmānaṃ mudrāsādhanam uttamam //
daṇḍākaṇṣṭhā tu nairvāṇī vajravajrā tu māraṇī //
daṇḍāgrā ghātanī caiva bhīmākṣī tu bhayaṃkarī //

div.ab: sarvavajrakulavajramaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ

lg.l: atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatavajradhāraṇīsamayasaṃbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sarvavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajravidyottamo bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajramāyo vidyārāja imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //
atha vajrakuṇḍalir vajrakrodha imāṃ samayamudrām abhāṣat //
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar apīdaṃ sarvavajrakulavajramaṇḍalam abhāṣat //
caturasram ed. aśram uttaradvāraṃ sūtrayed bāhyamaṇḍalam //
bhīmāṃ śriyaṃ sarasvatīṃ durgāṃ koṇeṣu vāmataḥ /
bāhyakoṇeṣu mudrā vā āsām eva tu saṃlikhet //
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvad vidhivistaram iti //

div.ab: athātra vajramaṇḍale yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā vajrāṅkuśādibhiḥ samayakarma kṛtvā, vajradhārimudrāṃ yathāvad baddhvā brūyān:

lg.l: na kasya cit tvayādṛṣṭasamayasyaitāḥ samayamudrāḥ purato vaktavyāḥ /

div.ab: tatas tat karmavajraṃ vajradhārimudrāyā upari sthāpya yathāvat praveśayet//

lg.l: yatra patati sāsya samayamudrā vaśyā bhavati //
tato mukhabandhaṃ muktvā maṇḍalaṃ yathāvad darśayitvā, samayamudrārahasyaṃ brūyāt //
mātaraś ca bhaginyaś ca bhāryā duhitaro 'nugā iti //
oṃ sarvavajragāmini sarvabhakṣe sādhaya guhyavajriṇi hūṃ phaṭ //
tataḥ sarvaśuddhicittatām avetya, sarvamudrā manasttamāny api sarvakarmāṇi kurvantīty āha bhagavān vajradharaḥ //
mukhorṇā ca mukhodvāntā mūrdhni sthāpya dvidhīkṛteti //
anayā baddhayā samyak sidhyed vidyottamaḥ svayam //

div.ab: sarvavajrakuladharmasamayamaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ

lg.l: atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatadharmasamayasaṃbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemaṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar apīmaṃ svadharmasamayam abhāṣat //
oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svar huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar apīdaṃ sarvavajrakuladharmasamayamaṇḍalam abhāṣat //

div.ab: athātra dharmasamayamaṇḍale yathāvat karma kṛtvā, vajradhārimudrāṃ savajraghaṇṭāṃ baddhvā praveśyaivaṃ brūyāt/

lg.l: na tvayā kasya cid asamayadṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭadevakulasya vaktavyam iti //
yathā raṇāpyate ghaṇṭā śabdaś cāsya yathā dhruvam /
tatredaṃ karmavajraṃ te nāśaṃ kuryāt tathā dhruvam //
duṣṭamaitrī virāgaś ca yadi kuryād bhavān kadeti //
tato mukhabandhaṃ muktvā maṇḍalaṃ darśya, dharmasamayamudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet //
māyopamaṃ jagad idaṃ duḥkhaṃ ghaṇṭopamaṃ tathā /
nirvāṇaṃ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ vajraṃ bhediṣv anuttamam iti //
daṇḍāt samo na nirghāto mithyādṛṣṭir bhayaṃkara iti //
madāt tulyo na dhairyo 'sti mālātulyaṃ na bandhanam /
prahāro nigrahāgryo hi saparśānāṃ tu samīraṇāḥ /
tejasāṃ hutabhug jyeṣṭhaḥ bhojanānāṃ tu lohitam iti //
daṃṣṭrāśuddhaḥ praviṣṭas tu mṛtyuḥ sarvapade sthitaḥ /
bhayāt tulyo na vighno 'sti jalāt tulyo na vai rasa iti //

div.ab: sarvavajrakulakarmamaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ

lg.l: atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatakarmasamayodbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar api svakarmottamām abhāṣat //
oṃ vajravidyottame nṛtya nṛtya vikurva vikurva hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrakrodhavajrāgni jvālaya triśūlaṃ bhinda hṛdayaṃ vajreṇa hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajraheme chinda cakreṇa vajriṇi hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrakaumārī śīghram āveśaya ghaṇṭāśabdena vajrapāṇipriye vajrasamayam anusmara raṇa raṇa hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajraśānti japa japākṣamālayā sarvān māraya śāntadṛṣṭyā hūṃ phaṭ //
atha vajramuṣṭi hana hana vajreṇa bhinda bhinda pīḍaya pīḍaya sarvaduṣṭahṛdayāni, oṃ śumbha niśumbha hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrāmṛte sarvaduṣṭān gṛhṇa bandha hana paca vidhvaṃsaya vināśaya bhinda chinda bhasmīkuru mūrdhānaṃ tāḍaya vajreṇa ye kecid mam amukasya vighnavināyakās tān dāmaya dīptakrodhavajriṇi hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrakāṇṭi māraya saumye rūpe pradīptarāgeṇa śīghraṃ sphoṭaya hṛdayaṃ vajradharasatyena mahājyotsnākarāle śītaraśmivajriṇi hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajradaṇḍāgre ghātaya huṃ or hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajramekhale khana khana śabdena vaśīkuru māraya bhīṣaṇi hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajravilaye chinda sina bhinda vajreṇa mādayonmādaya piba piba hūṃ ed. hūm phaṭ //
oṃ vajrāśane bhakṣa duṣṭān vajradarśane śantidhāriṇi mānuṣamāṃsāhāre nararudhirasavapriye majja
vāsānulepenaviliptagātra ānaya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇādīni saṃgrahamayavarade bhakṣiṇi hūṃ phaṭ //
atha vajravasana ānaya sarvavastrānnapānādyupakāraṇāṇi śīghraṃ vaśīkurv idaṃ me prayacchāviśāviśa satyaṃ kathaya vajrakośadhāriṇi huṃ or hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajravaśy ānaya vaśīkuru sarvastriyaḥ sarvapuruṣān dāsīkuru kruddhān prasādaya vyavahārebhyo vyutāraya vijayaṃkari vajrapatākādhāriṇi huṃ or hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajradūty ānaya sarvān maṇḍalaṃ praveśaya bandhaya sarvakarmāṇi me kuru śīghraṃ laghu laghu trāsaya māraya māraya rāveṇa vajrakhaṭvāṅgadhāriṇi huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vegavajriṇi ghu ghu ghu ghu śabdena māraya vikira vidhvaṃsaya vajrapaṭadhāriṇi huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrajvāle jvālaya sarvaṃ vajrajvālayā daha daha bhasmīkuru huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajravikaṭe pravikaṭadaṃṣṭrākarālabhīṣanavaktre śīghraṃ gṛhṇāveśaya bhakṣaya rudhiraṃ piba mahāyakṣiṇi vajrapāśadhāriṇi huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajramukhy ānaya vajradaṃṣṭre bhayānike pātālanivāsini khana khana khāhi khāhi sarvaṃ mukhe praveśaya sphoṭaya marmāṇi sarvaduṣṭānāṃ vajraniśitāsidhāriṇi huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrakāli mahāpretarūpiṇi mānuṣamāṃsarudhirapriya ehy ehi gṛhṇa gṛhṇa bhakṣaya vajraḍākini vajraśaṅkale sarvadevagaṇamātṛbhūte hara hara prāṇān amukasya
kapālamālālaṃkṛtasarvakāye kiṃ cirāsi vajrakhaṭvāṅgadhāriṇīpretamānuṣaśarīre śīghram āveśaya praveśaya bandhaya māraya vajrarākṣasi huṃ huṃ huṃ huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajrapūtane mānuṣamāṃsavāsarudhiramūtrapurīṣaśleśmasiṃghāṇakaretogarbhāhāriṇy āyāhi śīghram idam asya kuru vajraśodhanikādhāriṇi sarvakarmāṇi me kuru huṃ phaṭ //
oṃ vajramakare grasa grasa śīghraṃ śīghraṃ praveśaya pātālaṃ bhakṣaya vajramarakadhāriṇi huṃ phaṭ //
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar apīdaṃ sarvavajrakulakarmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat //
teṣāṃ pārśveṣu paṅktyā vai mahāsattvān niveśayet //
koṇeṣu dvārabhāgeṣu hy anupūrvaṃ dhūpādikam iti //
athātra karmamaṇḍale samākarṣaṇādikarma kṛtvā yathāvad vajradhārikarmasamayamudrāṃ baddhvaivaṃ vadet /
na tvayā kasya cid adṛṣṭadevatākramavijñātakarmasyedaṃ guhyakarma vaktavyam /
oṃ vajradhāry āveśaya praveśaya nṛtyāpaya sarvakarmasiddhiṃ me prayaccha hūṃ aḥ hūṃ a la la la la vajri //
tataḥ prabhṛti sarvakarmāṇi kāyavāgdṛṣṭimanovajra^mudrābhir or mudrādibhir īpsitena karoti //
mahāvajradharādīṃś ca karmasiddhir bhaved dhruvam iti //
atha vajrapāṇiḥ sarvavajrakulān sarvasattvārthatāyāṃ yāvat saṃniyojyāvaivartikabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpya jānann eva bhagavantam etad avocat //
tad ajñāpayasva kiṃ tat tathāgataguhyam iti //
atha bhagavān sarvatathāgataguhyavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgataguhyam abhāṣat //
yathā yathā hi vineyāḥ sarvasattvāḥ svajātataḥ /
tathā tathā hi sattvārthaṃ kuryād rāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ //
mārayet sarvasattvāṃs tu na sa pāpena lipyate //
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva idaṃ svamaṇiguhyam abhāṣat //
haraṃs tu sarvavittāni na sa pāpena lipyate //
atha vajranetro bodhisattva idaṃ sarvadharmaguhyam abhāṣat //
rāgatulyasukhaṃ nāsti jinebhyas taṃ tu saṃdadan /
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva idaṃ svakarmaguhyam abhāṣat //
sarvakarmāṇi kuryāt vai sa bahupuṇyam āpnuta iti //
atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgato bhagavate guhyadhāriṇe vajradharāya sādhukārair abhiṣṭavat //
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te /
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe /

div.ab: sarvatathāgatadharmasamayo nāma mahākalparājaḥ

lg.l: atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya, tam eva vajrapāṇiṃ bhagavantaṃ sarvadharmeśvaram avalokiteśvaram anena nāmāṣṭaśatenādhyeṣitavantaḥ //
sanso śaṃkara śudhārtha buddhapadma namo 'stu te //
yainaṃ sarvātmanā gauṇaṃ nāmnām aṣṭaśataṃ tava /
svakaṃ tu kulam utpādya dharma-maṇḍalam uttamam iti //

atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvatathāgatādhyeṣaṇavacanam upaśrutya, yena bhagavāñ chākyamunis tathāgataḥ, tenābhimukhaṃ sthitvā, tad vajrapadmaṃ svahṛdi pratiṣṭhāpyedam udānam udānayām āsa //
aho hi paramaṃ śuddhaṃ vajrapadmam idaṃ mama /
pitāham asya ca suto 'dhiṣṭhasva kulaṃ tv idam iti //
atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgatavajradharmasamayasaṃbhavādhiṣṭhānpadmaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgatadharmasamayaṃ nāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayān niścacāra //

div.ab: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ padmākārāḥ anekavarṇarūpaliṅeryāpatharaśmayo viniḥsṛtya,

lg.l: sarvalokadhātuṣu rāgādīni saṃbuddhadharmatājñānāni saṃśodhya, punar apy āgatyāryāvalokiteśvarasya hṛdaye praviṣṭā iti //
atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatadharmasamayaṃ nāma vidyottamam abhāṣat //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva idaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva idaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //
atha vajranetro bodhisattva idaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva idaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //
atha khalv avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvarūpasaṃdarśanaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvajagadvinayasamayaṃ nāma svahṛdayam abhāṣat //

div.ab: athāsmin bhāṣitamātre āryāvalokiteśvarahṛdayāt sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ āryāvalokiteśvararūpadhāriṇaḥ padmapratiṣṭhāḥ padmamudrācihnadhārivicitravarṇarūpaveśālaṃkārāḥ tathāgatādisarvasattvamūrtidharā mahābodhisattvavigrahā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,

lg.l: sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ yathāvaineyatayā svarūpāṇi saṃdarśyāśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuvinayaṃ kṛtvā, punar apy āgatya, vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalayogena bhagavataḥ śākyamunes tathāgatasya sarvataś candramaṇḍalāśritā bhūtvedam udānam udānayinsuḥ //
yatra hy upāyavināyād devā api bhavanti hi //

atha bhagavān avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakulam utpādya, sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvasattvābhayārthaprāptyuttamasiddhivajradharmatājñānābhijñāvāptiphalahetor niryātya, sarvajagadvinayaṃ nāma mahāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //
vajraṃ ratnāṃ tathā padmaṃ viśvapadmaṃ tathaiva ca //
oṃ padmamaṇiketudhara candraprahlādayāvalokiteśvara dehi me sattvārthān śīghraṃ samaya hūṃ //
oṃ padmāṭṭahāsaikādaśamukha haḥ haḥ haḥ hūṃ //
oṃ padmakumāra padmaśaktidhara khaḍgena cchinda cchinda hūṃ phaṭ //

oṃ padmalīlakaṇṭhāśaṃkhacakragadāpadmapāṇi vyāghracarmanivasana kṛṣṇasarpakṛtayajñopvītājinacarmavāmaskandhottarīya nārāyaṇarūpadhara trinetra muñcāṭṭahāsaṃ praveśaya samayān dehi me siddhim avalokiteśvara hūṃ //
oṃ brahmapadmasaṃbhava japa japa padmabhāṣa hūṃ //
oṃ padmanarteśvara naṭa naṭa pūjaya sarvatathāgatān vajrakarmasamayākarṣaya praveśaya bandhayāveśaya sarvakarmasiddhiṃ me prayacchāvalokiteśvara hūṃ //
oṃ abhayaṃdadāvalokite.vara rakṣa bandha padmakavacaṃ samaya haṃ //
oṃ mahāpracaṇḍaviśvarūpavikaṭapadmadaṃṣṭrākarālabhīṣaṇavaktra trāsaya sarvān padmayakṣa khāda khāda dhik dhik dhik //
oṃ padmamuṣṭisamayas tvaṃ bandha hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ padmalāsye rāgaya mahādevi rāgapūjāsamaye hūṃ //
oṃ padmadhūpapūjāsamaye prahlādaya padmakuladayite mahāgaṇi padmarati hūṃ //
oṃ padmapuṣpapūjāsamaye padmavāsini mahāśriye padmakulapratīhāri sarvārthān sādhaya hūṃ //
oṃ dīpapūjāsamaye padmakulasundari mahādūty ālokaṃ saṃjanaya padmasarasvati hūṃ //
oṃ gandhapūjāsamaye mahāpadmakulaceṭi kuru sarvakarmāṇi me padmasiddhi hūṃ //
samālekhyā yathāvat tu teeṣāṃ ca hṛdayārthata iti //
oṃ hayagrīvamahāpadmāṅkuśākarṣaya śīghraṃ sarvapadmakulasamayān padmāṅkuśadhara hūṃ jjaḥ //
oṃ amoghapadmapāśakrodhākarṣaya praveśaya mahāpaśupatiyamavaruṇakuberabrahmaveśadhara padmakulasamayān huṃ huṃ //
oṃ padmasphoṭa bandha sarvapadmakulasamayān śīghraṃ hūṃ vaṃ //
oṃ ṣaṃmukhasanatkumāraveśadhara padmaghaṇṭayāveśaya sarvapadmakulasamayān sarvamudrāṃ bandhaya sarvasiddhayo me prayaccha padmāveśa aḥ aḥ aḥ aḥ //
tatrādita eva padmācāryo vajrapadmasamayamudrāṃ baddhvā, yathāvat praviśya, vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalayogena karma kuryād ebhir hṛdayaiḥ //
tatas tathaivājñāṃ mārgya, tathaiva samayamudrayā svayam abhiṣicya, padmavigrahaṃ gṛhya, svapadmanāmoccārya, padmāṅkuśādibhiś ca karma kṛtvā, tatas tābhir eva dharmamudrābhir mahāsattvān sādhayet //
nirbhidya tat kṣaṇam yāyād yadi brūyād imaṃ nayam //
na kasya cit tvayedaṃ guhyavidhivistaram ākhyeyam /
viṣamāparihāreṇa ca kālakriyāṃ kṛtvā narakapatanaṃ syād iti //
tataḥ śvetavastrottarīyaḥ śvetanaktakena mukhaṃ baddhvā praveśayed anena hṛdayena //
tato yathāvat karma kṛtvā, padmavigrahaṃ pāṇau dātavyam //
yathā raktam idaṃ padmaṃ gotradoṣair na lipyate /
bhāvayet sarvaśuddhiṃ tu tathā pāpair na lipyate //
padmaṃ tu hṛdaye likhya padmabhāvanayā hṛdi /
buddhabimbaṃ lalāṭe tu likhyābhīkṣṇaṃ tu bhāvayet /
buddhabimbaṃ mukhe viddhvā jihvāyāṃ tu prabhāvayet |
bhāvayan padmam uṣṇīṣe khegāmī sa vaśaṃ nayed iti //
kuḍye vāpy atha vākāśe bhāvayan padmam uttamam /
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā bhāvayan padmam uttamam /
yadā paśyet tadā gṛhṇa kāmyād adreśyatāṃ vrajet //
kuḍye vāpy atha vākāśe viśvapadmaṃ samādhayet /
paśyan gṛhṇa pradānaṃ viśvarūpī tadā bhavet //
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā vajrapadmaṃ tu bhāvayet /
taṃ tu gṛhṇan kṣaṇāc caiva padmavidyādharo bhavet //
oṃ samādhiviśvapadma tiṣṭha viśvarūpyaṃ darśa bhagavan dhaḥ //
lokeśvaraṃ lokeṣvaraṃ, ed samālikhya maṇḍalādiṣu tasya vai /
svam ātmānaṃ tataḥ siddho bahurūpī bhavet kṣanāt //
bhāvayan padmapadmaṃ tu svam ātmānaṃ tathātmanā /
padmapadmā samādhiṃ tu dadyād viśvā suvaiśvatām //
kāmeśvarī surāgitvaṃ dadyāt tuṣṭiṃ tu sādhutā /
tarayā cottarā siddhiḥ saubhāgyaṃ padma khaḍgayā //
lāsyā ratiṃ dhanaṃ mālā svaraṃ gītā sukhaṃ nṛtyā //
dhūpā hlādaṃ sukhaṃ puṣpā dīpā dṛṣṭiṃ gandhā sugandhatām /
vajrāñjaliṃ tu saṃdhāya lintu vajrakarmakarī bhavet /
parivartya tu padmena hṛdi sthāpya dṛḍhaṃ karī //
padmamuṣṭiṃ dvidhīkṛtya karmamudrāḥ sa sādhayed iti //
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatadharmadhāraṇīsamayasaṃbhavamudrādhiṣṭhānapadmaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ imāṃ svakulasaṃbhavāṃ vidyottamām abhāṣāt //
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahā sattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajranetro bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajraviśo bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṃ svakulasamayamudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //
tasya madhye supadme vai vajradhātvīśvarīṃ likhet //
tatra madhye likhet padmaṃ padmais tu parivāritam //
oṃ bhṛkuṭi taṭi vai taṭi padme hūṃ //
oṃ padmahāsiny ekādaśavaktre diri diri iṭṭe vaṭṭe cale pracale kusumadhare ili praviśa siddhiṃ me prayaccha hūṃ //
tatra madhye supadme tu padmamudrāṃ niveśayet //
oṃ padmacakraśaṃkhagadādhāriṇi nīlakaṇṭhe sidhya sidhya hūṃ //
oṃ paṇḍaravāsini padmasaṃbhave vada vada hūṃ //
oṃ padmanatreśvari pūjaya sarvātathāgatān naṭa naṭa hūṃ //
oṃ abhyaye padmakavacabandhe rakṣa māṃ hūṃ haṃ //
oṃ mahāpracaṇḍi padmayakṣiṇi viśvarūpadhāriṇi bhīṣāpaya sarvaduṣṭān khāda khāda hūṃ phaṭ //
oṃ padmāṅkuśy ākarṣaya mahāpadmakulān hayagrīvasamaye hūṃ jaḥ //
oṃ amoghapāśakrodhasamaye praviśa prav.eśaya sarvasamayāṃ hūṃ //
oṃ padmaghaṇṭādhāri śīghram āveśaya samayāṃ ṣaṇmukhi aḥ //
atha mudrāmaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṃ kṛtvā, padmaśiṣyān yathāvat praveśayet //
na tvayā kasya cid vaktavyaṃ yad atra guhyam /
mā te narakapatanaṃ bhaved du.khāni cātra janmanīti //
tad yathā vadati tathā siddhir iti /
tad yadi śvetālokaṃ paśyet tasyottamasiddhijñānaṃ śikṣayet /
evaṃ vajradhātvādiṣv api sarvamaṇḍaleṣu yathābhājanatayā mudrājñānāni śikṣayed, iyaṃ parīkṣā //
bhāvayaṃs tu mahāmudrām agryāṃ siddhim avāpnuyāt //
bhāvayaṃs tu svam ātmānam agryāṃ siddhim avāpnute //
sādhaya vidhivac chīghram agryāṃ siddhim avāpnuyāt // iti //
hiraṇyaṃ tu mukhe viddhvā bhāvayet svayam ātmanā /
bhāvayan svayam ātmānam eko bhūyāt sahasraśaḥ //
muktāphalaṃ mukhe viddhvā bhāvayet svayam ātmanā /
lokeśvaraṃ svam ātmānam eko bhūyāt sahasraśaḥ //
bhāvayan svayam ātmānam eko bhūyāt sahasraśaḥ // iti //
padmaṃ gṛhya puraḥ sthāti yasya so 'syānurajyati //
bhāvayet svayam ātmānaṃ padmaṃ gṛhya yathā tathā /
nirīkṣed vajradṛṣṭyā vai sarvalokaṃ sa rāgayet //
karābhyāṃ bhrāmayaṃs taṃ tu rāgayet sarvayoṣitaḥ // iti //
chinded yasya puraḥ padmaṃ tasya mṛtyuḥ kṣaṇād bhavet //
padmaṃ gṛhya dṛḍhaṃ samyak samayāgryā tayaiva hi /
sphoṭayet taṃ tu sudṛḍhaṃ yasya nāmnā sa naśyati //
samādhimudrāṃ saṃdhyāya padmaṃ gṛhya yathā tathā /
yasya nāmnā tu padmaṃ vai chindet sa tu vinaśyati //
sphoṭayed yasya saṃkruddhaḥ sphuṭet tasya tu jīvitam // iti //
oṃ mahāpadmacheda chedaya, Ch māraya hoḥ phaṭ //
oṃ mahāpadmasphoṭa nāśaya sphoṭaya nāśaya, Ch raṭ phaṭ //
oṃ dharmapadmacheda chedaya, Ch vināśaya dhṛt phaṭ //
oṃ karmapadmasphoṭa sphoṭaya sphoṭaya, Ch jīvitam asya kṛt phaṭ //
padmaṃ tu yoṣitāṃ cintya vajraṃ tasyopari svayam /
padmaṃ tu yoṣitāṃ cintya buddhaṃ tasyopari svayam /
padmaṃ tu yoṣitāṃ cintya padmaṃ tasyopari svayam /
padmaṃ tu yoṣitāṃ cintya viśvaṃ tasyopari svayam /
rāmayan viśvapadmāgrīṃ viśvāṃ siddhim avāpnuyāt // iti //
dvyagrā maṇis tathā padmaṃ vajrabandhaṃ tathaiva ca //
sā evāṅguṣṭhamuktā tu tarjanyā tarjanī grahā /
valitā suratiḥ proktā sādhukāryā tathaiva ca //
kṛtvā tu mukhatodvāntaṃ kṛtvā mukhata udvāntaṃ ?
utthitāṃ tarjanīṃ vāmāṃ karṣayet sudṛḍhaṃ tathā //
sā eva hṛdi sūryā tu mūrdhni padmadhvajīkṛtā /
parivartya ca hāsā tu sthitā padmāṭṭahāsinī //
kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhasaṃdhī tu tārāyāḥ samayo hy ayam //
talacakrā tathaiveha japadātrī tathaiveha japadātrī tathaiva ca //
vajrabandhaṃ tale kṛtvā bandhas tādṛśa eva hi // iti //
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatadharmajñānasamayasaṃbhavādhiṣṭhānapadaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ imaṃ svakuladharmasaṃbhavaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svadharmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat //
saṃsiddho bhavate śīghram ākāśena sa gacchati //
saṃsiddho bhavate śīghram ūrdhvam utpatati kṣaṇāt //
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṃ tu bhāvayet /
anena vidhinā siddho adṛśyo bhavati kṣaṇāt //
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṃ tu bhāvayet /
tatrārūḍhaḥ svam ātmānaṃ bhāvayann adṛśyo bhavet //
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṃ tu bhāvayet /
yadā paśyet tadā gṛhṇec chīgram adṛśyo bhavati //
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṃ tu bhāvayet /
dṛṣṭvā tu bhuktvā tat padmam adreśyo bhavati kṣaṇāt // iti //
tatrārūḍhas tu khegāmī kāmarūpī bhaved dhruvam // iti //
tayā gṛhya tu vai padmaṃ dadyād vaśyakaro bhavet //
jñānapadmaṃ daded yasya so 'sya śīghraṃ vaśībhavet //
yasya dadyāt samupaśaḥ sa nū vaśyaḥ?
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatadharmakarmasamayasaṃbhavādhiṣṭhānapadmaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //:
atha vajrapāṇir bodhisattva imāṃ svakulakarmasaṃbhavāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //:
atha vajranetro bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //:
athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svakarmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat //:
buddhasya sarvataḥ sarvāḥ padmacihnadharā likhet // iti //
athātra karmamaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṃ kṛtvā yathāvat praveśyaivaṃ vadet //:
na tvayā, kulaputra, kasyacid ayaṃ vaktavyaḥ /
pāpāni deśayañ chīghraṃ savapāpān sa śodhayet //
śudhya śudhya iti prodya sarvakarmāni śodhayet //
budhya budhya pravartaṃs tu sarvakarmāṇi śodhayet //
dhī dhī dhīti procyan vai sarvakarmāṇi śodhayet //
hī hī hī hīti saṃdhāya sarvakarmāṇi śodhayet // iti //
oṃ oṃ oṃ oṃ iti brūyāt sarvapūjāṃ pravartanam //
bhū bhū bhū bhūr iti prokte sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet //
he he he heti saṃdhāya sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet //
dhe dhe dhe dha iti procya sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet // iti //
hrī hrī hrī hrīti varteta siddhir lokeśvarī bhavet //
śrī śrī śrī śrīti saṃdhāya prāpnuyāt siddhim uttamām //
dhig dhig dhig dhig iti prokte padmakrodhas tu sidhyati //
siḥ siḥ siḥ sīti saṃdhāya padmasiddhim avāpnute // iti //
aho sukha iti prokte sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet //
priye priyeti vai prokte buddhānāṃ bhavati priyaḥ //
aho rateti vai prokte ratir bhavet sa śāśvatī //
sukha sukha iti prokte sukhaṃ tasya na hīyate //
karmasamayāṃ dvidhīkṛtya karmamudrāḥ sa sādhayet // iti //
atha bhagavān punar api vajradharmasamayamudrādhisṭḥānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ svamudrāhṛdayaṃ niścacāra //:
atha vajrapāṇir bodhisattva idaṃ svamudrāhṛdayam abhāṣat //:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //:
atha vajranetro bodhisattva imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //:
athāryāvalokteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ caturmudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //:
athātra mahāmaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṃ kṛtvā, yathāvat praveśya brūyāt /:
na tvayedaṃ kasya cid vaktavyaṃ mā te mahāduḥkha.ṃ bhaved akālamaraṇaṃ viṣamakriyayā
padmaṃ hastena vai gṛhya samājighran prayatnataḥ /
tena gandhena saṃyojya buddhān āśu prasidhyati //
upaviśya yathātmānaṃ manasā sa tu mārayet //
caturmukhaṃ tu vai padmaṃ kārayitvā kareṇa tu /
oṃ padmamukuṭatathāgata vaśīkuru sarvān lokeśvarābhiṣekasamaya hoḥ //
oṃ padmapadma māraya sarvapratyarthikān, samādhijñāna dhik //
oṃ viśvapadma sarvakarmakaro bhava lalilvali lali hūṃ phaṭ //
raktaḥ san sarvakāryāṇi sādhayet samayo hy ayam /
duḥsādhyā 'pi hi mudrā vai kṣaṇāt sidhyati yogata iti //
athāryāvalokiteśvaro mahābodhisattva idaṃ sarvajagadvinayaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣat //:
athāryāvalokiteśvaro mahābodhisattva idaṃ sarvajagadvinayaṃ nāma maṇḍalam abhāṣat //:
bhāvayaṃs tu mahāmudrāṃ bhaved viśvadharopamaḥ // iti //
mudrāyām apy ekamudrāmaṇḍalayogena tathaiva siddhaya iti // //
atha sarvatathāgatā punaḥ samājam āgamyāvalokiteśvarāya mahābodhisattvāya sādhukārāṇy adadan //:
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te /
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe //
atha khalu sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya,
sarvatathāgatābhiṣekaratnaṃ tam eva vajradharam āryākāśagarbhaṃ mahābodhisattvam anena nāmāṣṭaśatenādhyeṣitavantaḥ //:
śuddha sarvārtha śuddhārtha dānacarya namo 'stu te //
dāna pradāna dānāgrya tyāga tyāgārya dāyaka /
yaḥ kaścid dhārayen nāmnām idaṃ te 'ṣṭaśataṃ śivam /
sarvabuddhābhiṣekaṃ tu sa prāpnoty anaghaḥ kṣaṇāt //
atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgata idaṃ sarvatathāgatamaṇisamayaṃ nāma vidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imaṃ svakulasaṃbhavaṃ vidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajranetro bodhisattva imaṃ svakulasaṃbhavaṃ vidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //
athāryākāśagarbho bodhisattva mahāsattvaḥ sarvatathāgatābhiṣekaratnaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ //
samanantarasamāpanne cātha tāvad eva sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyo vajramaṇiratnaraśmayo niścaritāḥ //
te sarvalokadhātavo 'vabhāsya, sarvasattvān sarvatathāgatābhiṣekair abhiṣicya, punar apy ekadhyībhūtvā, bhagavata ākāśagarbhasya mahābodhisattvasya hṛdaye 'nupraviṣṭā iti //

div.ab: atha tata ākāśagarbhahṛdayāt sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇi samantaraśmijvālāgarbhā vicitravajramaṇiratnābhiṣekādyābharaṇālamkārālaṃkṛtakāyā mahāvajramaṇiratnacihnamudrāvyagrakarā mahābodhisattvakāyā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,

lg.l: sarvalokadhātuṣu mahāratnavarṣādibhī ratnotpattibhiḥ saṃtoṣya punar āgatya, bhagavato vairocanasya sarvato vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalayogena candramaṇḍalāśritā bhūtvedam udānam udānayiṃsuḥ //
vajraratnakulaṃ tv edaṃ saṃbhūtaṃ jagadarthataḥ // iti //
sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvāśāparipūryai niryātyedaṃ sarvārthasiddhiṃ nāma mahāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //:
oṃ vajramaṇicihnākāśagarbha bhagavan sidhya sidhya hūṃ //
oṃ ratnāṅkuśākarṣaya sarvārthān ānaya śīghraṃ sarvatathāgatasatyam anusmara hūṃ //
oṃ maṇirāga vaśīkuru sarvārthān ānayākāśagarbha hūṃ //
tatra madhye likhet samyag ratnamālādharaṃ param //
oṃ ratnavṛṣṭi pravarṣaya sarvārthasaṃpado bhagavan maṇihasta hūṃ //
oṃ maṇidaṃṣṭrākarālamahāyakṣa hara hara sarvārthān bhīṣāpaya hūṃ //
oṃ sarvaratākarṣa āryāruṇamahāsattva bhagavantam ākāśagarbhaṃ codayākarṣaya śīghraṃ ho jaḥ //
oṃ sarvaratnapraveśasamaya praveṣaya samayān mahāmaṇirājakulaṃ ratnapāśa hūṃ //
athātra mahāmaṇḍale svayaṃ maṇiratnācāryo yathāvat praviśya vidhivistaram ātmanaḥ kṛtvā,
mā te sarvajanmasu dāridryaduḥkhān mokṣo na bhaven,
tato bhagavān ākāśagarbho bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ jalpāpayatīty uktamātre mukhabandhaṃ muktvā, mahāmaṇḍalaṃ darśayet //
tato yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvakāryāṇi sādhayed iti //
nidhānaṃ khanate yatra nidhānaṃ tatra paśyati //
baddhvā tu samayāgrīṃ vai nidhānaṃ yatra vidyate /
pīḍayet tatra tāṃ mudrāṃ svayam uttiṣṭhate tadā //
manasā caiva jānāti nidhānaṃ yatra tiṣṭhati //
tāṃ mudrām āviśed yatra nidhānaṃ tatra lakṣayet //
mahāmudrāṃ samādhāya yatra kāyaṃ tu veṣṭayet /
baddhvā tu samayāgrīṃ vai yatrāviśya parisphuṭet /
samādhimudrāṃ baddhvā vai yady āviśya svayaṃ punarḥ /
brūyād yatra nidhānaṃ tu mahāratnamayaṃ bhavet //
karmamudrāṃ tu baddhvā vai yadāviśya parasparam /
hastau bandhe tu samayāṃ nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // iti //
oṃ ākāśagarbha maṇiratna sphuṭa sphuṭa yatra nidhiḥ //
baddhvā tu vai mahāmudrāṃ yatrāśaṅkā bhavet tadā /
yatra śaṅkā bhavet tatra samayāgrīṃ tu bandhayet /
yadā mokṣaṃ svayaṃ yāyān nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet //
samādhimudrāṃ baddhvā vai śaṅkā yatra bhaved dhruvā /
jñānam upādya vijñeyaṃ nidhis tatrāsti śāśvataḥ //
yatra bhūyo bhavec chaṅkā karmamudrāṃ tu tatra vai /
badhnīyād vidhivat tāṃ tu sphuṭej jñeyo nidhiḥ punaḥ //
baddhvā tu samayāgrīṃ vai nidhiṃ tu parimārgayet /
yatrastho dṛḍhatāṃ yāyān nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet //
yatrastho jñānavān bhūyān nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet //
baddhvā karma mayīṃ mudrāṃ nidhiṃ tu parimārgayet /
yatrasthaḥ karmamudrāṃ tu bhrāmayet tatra nirdiśet //
bhāvayaṃs tu mahāmudrāṃ samāveśān nidhiṃ labhet //
baddhvā tu samayāgrīṃ vai rāmayaṃs tu striyaṃ tathā /
yatra mudrā dṛḍhībhūyām nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet //
sphuṭed yatra tu sā mudrā nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet //
ratnadaṃṣṭrā hared arthān maṇimuṣṭyā tu sidhyati //
sā evāṅguṣṭhavajreṇa maṇiṃ dadyād dhṛdi sthitam //
kuḍmalāgryā maṇiṃ baddhvā lokeśo dhanado bhavet /
sā eva valitā caiva tarjanyā tarjanīgrahā /
maṇidṛṣṭis tu sā khyātā dṛṣṭvārthānāṃ prahārikā //
sā eva hāsasaṃsthā tu līlayā parivatitā /
maṇikośā hared arthān jagatāṃ vikrameṇa tu //
sa tu saṃdhāya vācā vai svājñayā harate dhanam //

div.ab: ratnamuṣṭiṃ dvidhīkṛtya karmamudrās tu sādhe// iti

lg.l: atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatābhiṣekadhāraṇīsamayasaṃbhavaratnādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //:
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imāṃ svakulasaṃbhavāṃ mudrām abhāṣat //:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //:
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //:
atha bhagavān āryākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svakulasamayamudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //:
paryaṅkasthaṃ maṇiṃ pūrvaṃ vajradhātoḥ puro likhet /
oṃ sarvārthasiddhiprade mahāvajraratnasamayamaṇi sarvārthān me sādhaya dhāraṇi hūṃ //
oṃ vajramaṇiratnanetrānaya vaśīkuru sarvārthasaṃpadaḥ śīghraṃ dṛṣṭyaṅkuśi hūṃ //
oṃ maṇiratnasūrye jvālaya sarvaṃ mahātejini hūṃ //
na tvayā kasyacid ayaṃ nayo vaktavyaḥ,

div.ab: ity uktvā,

lg.l: ātmanas tu lalāṭe vai sthāpya rājā bhaved dhruvam //
taj jñānaratnaṃ saṃsthāpya bhaved rājā svayaṃ kṛtaḥ //
vajraratnaṃ nabhe likhya karmamudrāṃ tu bandhayet /
svasthāne tat pratiṣṭhāpya bhaved rājā svayaṃ kṛtaḥ //
vajraratnaṃ tu hṛdaye mahāmudrāṃ tu bhāvayet /
baddhvā vai ratnavajrīṃ tu bhaved rājā tu sarvataḥ //
baddhvā vai karmamudrāṃ tu bhaved rājā sukarmakṛt // iti
bhāvayaṃs tu mahāmudrāṃ mahārājā bhavet sa tu //
bhāvayet sattvavajrāṃ tu samayānāṃ bhavet patiḥ //
bhāvayan dhyānamudrāṃ tu bhaved dharmādhipo dhruvam //
bhāvayet karmamudrāṃ tu bhavet karmādhipaḥ svam // iti
sauvarṇaṃ vāpi raupyaṃ vā vajraratnaṃ tu bhāvayet /
sauvarṇam anyaratnaṃ vā vajraratnaṃ tv anuttaram /
sthāpya bhūyo lalāṭe tu bhaved rājā mahādhanaḥ //
sauvarṇam anyaratnaṃ vā vajraratnaṃ tu bhāvayet /
svamukhe caiva prakṣipya bhaved vācāṃ patis tu saḥ //
sarvarṇam anyaratnaṃ vā vajraratnaṃ tu dhārayet /
uṣṇīṣe bhāvayan bhūyaḥ sarvakarmapatir bhavet // iti
mahāvajramaṇiṃ baddhvā taṃ maṇiṃ strībhage tathā /
praveśya tu mahāmudrāṃ bhāvayan siddhim āpnute //
baddhayā tu bhavet siddhir abhiṣekeṣu sarvaśaḥ //
taṃ maṇiṃ strībhage viddhvā bhavet siddhir anuttarā //
baddhayā tu bhavet siddhiḥ sarvakarmasv anuttarā // iti
baddhvā ratnapratiṣṭhāṃ tu lalāṭe tv abhiṣicyate //
dvyagrānāmavikāsā tu padmaṃ kṛtvā tu sidhyati //
bhāvayaṃs tu maṇīn eva bhavet suparivāravān //
sa eva tarjanī vajrasaṃsthā eva tthāṅkuśī /
sā eva sūryā vartā tu mūrdhni bāhuprasāritā /
tābhiḥ padmaṃ tu saṃbhāvya madhyamābhyāṃ maṇīkṛtā //
tāṃ tu mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya ratnavṛṣṭiṃ tu varṣayet //
sā eva cakrayogā tu hṛdi ratnadvidhīkṛtā /
guhyaguhyāḥ samāsena siddhiṃ dadyuś caturguṇam // iti
yathā yad vajraguhye tu sarvakālaṃ na bandhayet /
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmamudrāḥ samāsataḥ // iti
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatābhiṣekajñānasamayasaṃbhavādhiṣṭhanaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ svavidyottamam abhāṣat //:
athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svakulajñānamaṇḍalam abhāṣat //:
hṛdi cihnās tu saṃlekhyā dharmamanḍalayogataḥ // iti
mā te maraṇakālaḥ śīghram evāsiddhasya syāt /
bhāvayan yācayed arthān dehi ratna iti bruvan //
bhāvayan yācayed ratnān dehi dehīti vāg bruvan //
samāpattyā tu saddharmaṃ dehi jñāneti yācayet //
samāpattyā tu satkarma karme dehīti yācayet // iti
oṃ dehi saddharmaṃ bhagvan vajragarbha satsattva //
oṃ dehi bhagavan satkarma bhagavan vajragarbha //
yadā tu hṛdayaṃ kampet tataḥ siddho dhanaṃ dadet //
yadā tu karmapate śīrṣam abhiṣekaṃ sa lapsyati //
vajragarbhaṃ mukhe viddhvā lābhayet tatra eva hi /
yadā tu sphuṭate tat tu tadā vāg asya sidhyati //
yadā tu jvalate tat tu tadaivordhvaṃgamo bhavet // iti
yācayed dehi siddhiṃ me ili ratneti sidhyati //
yācayed dehi me dharmaṃ cili ratneti lapsyati //
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā parāṃ siddhim avāpnute //
taṃ priyaṃ yasya ramayet sarvalokaṃ sa rāgayet //
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatābhiṣekakarmasamayasaṃbhavādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //:
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imāṃ svakarmasaṃbhavāṃ vidyottamām abhāṣat //:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //
atha vajranetro bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhaṣat //
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //:
athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ svakulakarmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat //
pūjayan sarvabuddhāṃs tu svabhiṣekān sa lapsyati //
pūjayan sarvabuddhāṃs tu nāśayej jagad uttamam //
pūjayan sarvabuddhāṃs tu sarvārthāṃl labhate kṣaṇāt // iti
pūjayan sarvabuddhāṃs tu sarvalokaṃ sa rāgayet // iti
vajraratnāṃ dvidhīkṛtya karmamudrāḥ sa sādhayet // iti
atha bhagavān ratnamudrāṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamām abhāṣat //:
atha vajrapāṇir bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //:
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ svamudrām abhāṣat //
athāryākāśagarbho bidhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ maṇikulacaturmudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat //:
lalāṭe tu pratiṣṭhāpya sarvasiddhim avapnuyat // iti
oṃ vajraratna sarvābhiṣekasarvasiddhayo me prayaccha rala rala hūṃ traḥ //
paṭiṃ vāpi priyāṃ vā pi striyaṃ vā puruṣo 'pi vā /
oṃ vajraratna sakhividyādharatvaṃ prayaccha śīghram abhiṣiñcāhi
athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṃ sarvārthasiddhiṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣat //:
yathāvat tu samālekhyaṃ sarvasiddhes tu maṇḍalam // iti
rūpādīnāṃ tu kāmānām aviraktaḥ sukhāni tu /
niryātayaṃs tu buddhebhyaḥ kalpasiddhim avāpunte // iti
evaṃ paṭādiṣu sattvaṃ mudrāṃ vā maṇḍaleṣu likhya sādhayed iti //
atha sarvatathāgataḥ punaḥ samājam āgamyākāśagarbhaṃ mahābodhisattvam anena sādhkāradānenācchāditavantaḥ //
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te /
sādhu te vajradharmāya sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe //
