sarvakalpopāyasiddhividhivistaratantra
(2134: no text)

lg.l: ihaiva janmani varaṃ yadīcched uttamaṃ śivam /
buddhatvaṃ tena kāryedaṃ na cet siddhir yathopari //
ihaiva janmani padaṃ yadīcchet sauriṇaṃ śubham /
ātmanas tena kāryedaṃ na cet siddhir yathopari //
yathā vajradharaḥ siddhis tathāham iti bhāvayan /
buddhasauritvam āpnoti na cet siddhir yathopari // iti
svabhāvaśuddhyā vācā vai sarvadharmā iti bruvan /
buddhasauritvam āpnoti na cet siddhir yathopari // iti
buddhasauritvam āpnoti na cet siddhir yathopari // iti
sādhayaṃs tu mahāmudrāṃ buddhatvam iha janmani // iti
yathā vajradharaḥ siddhas tathāham iti bhāvayan /
anakṣareṣu dharmeṣu prapañco na hi vidyate /
idaṃ vadaṃs tu dharmāgrīṃ bhāvayan sauritāṃ vrajet // iti
yat karoti hi karmaṃ vai śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
niryātayañ jinebhyas tu kṣaṇāt sauritāṃ vrajet // iti
tasyāvirāgo dharmo 'smin mahāyāne tu sidhyati // iti
sphārayed vidhivad yogāt kṣaṇāt sauritvam āpnuyāt // iti
svabhāvaśuddhaḥ saṃrāga iti brūyād imaṃ nayam /
iti bhāvanāṃ bhāvayan vai kṣaṇāt sauritvam āpnute // iti
vadan dharmamayīṃ mudrām iha sauritvam āpnute // iti
udyogāt sauritāṃ yāti na cet siddhir yathopari // iti
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api sarvatathāgatasamayasiddhitantram udājahāra //:
alpatve vā bahutve vā yathābhirucitaṃ punaḥ /
avandhyo divaśaḥ kāryo dānena samayo hy ayam // iti
buddho dharma iti khyāta ity uktvā dharmatākṣaram /
akruddho 'pi hi saṃduṣṭān mārayañ chuddhim āpnute //
aliptaṃ salilaiḥ padmaṃ tathā rāgo na duṣyati /
iti bruvann akāryāṇi kurvan pāpair na lipyate //
dānāt samo na dharmo 'sti pratipattyā bravīti hi /
mahāmaṇikuladharmaḥ, na cet siddhir yathopari // iti
duṣṭasattvopaghātāya yad yat kāryaṃ karoti saḥ /
buddhānāṃ dehināṃ caiva karma sarvārthasādhakam // iti
etad buddhasya buddhatvaṃ na buddho bhavate 'nyataḥ //
bhāvayan dharmatām etām avāpnoti svakarmatām // iti
yathāvarṇe tu tau vetti tathā lokaṃ tu vetti saḥ //
śuddhe śuddham iti jñeyaṃ pāṇḍare tu prabhāsvaram /
svayaṃ kāyaṃ yathā vetti tathā vedyaṃ jaganmanaḥ //
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā kruddhaḥ san maṇḍalāni tu /
yādṛśāni tu paśyed vai vijñeyaṃ tādṛśaṃ mahaḥ //
yādṛgvarṇaṃ samāsena vetti cittaṃ sa tādṛśam //
sarvalokaṃ nirīkṣan vai pratibhāso hi yādṛśaḥ /
paśyate tādṛśaṃ caiva jagaccittaṃ tu lakṣayet // iti
kurvantyaś ca bhramantyo vā yathā paśyet tathā gamaḥ //
yasya yasya ca sattvasya samāpattya tu cintayet /
tasya tasya tathā caiva sarvacittāni budhyati //
svamudrāsattvam ātmānaṃ sākṣād iva sa paśyati //
tādṛśeṣv eva bimbeṣu madhye śyāmaṃ niyacchati /
siddhir vajrakulasyāgrā bhavec chīghraṃ yad icchati //
sphuranto raśmimaṇḍāni paśyan siddhiṃ laghv āpnuyāt // iti
bhāvayan bodhisattvāṃś ca darśayet kāyatas tathā //
tena yac cintayet kiñcit sudūrād api paśyati //
tena yac cintayet kāryaṃ sudūrasthaṃ śṛṇoti hi //
tena yaṃ sattvam udvīkṣec cittaṃ jānāti tasya saḥ //
mahāmudrāṃ samādhāya ātmano vā parasya vā /
manasā paśyate rūpaṃ yato janma sa āvahet //
mahāmudrāṃ samādhāya yāṃ yām ṛddhim abhīpsati /
yatra vā tatra vā tad vai saṃdarśayet samādhinā //
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatasatyasiddhitantram udājahāra //:
pālayaṃs tu mahāsatyaṃ laghu buddhatvam āpnuyāt //
pālayan vajrasatyaṃ tu siddhim agryām avāpnute //
vajradhāryām u śapathāṃ kṛtvā tu duratikramām /
pālayet satyam etad dhi yadīcchet siddhim uttamām //
pālayed uttamaṃ satyam abhiṣekaṃ sa lapsyati //
samayas tvam iti prokte sarvamudrākuleṣv api /
svayaṃ baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ yānti tataḥ paścād asādhitāḥ //
suratas tvam iti proite sarvamudrā asādhitāḥ /
svayaṃ baddhvā tu sidhyante tattvacodān mahātmanaḥ //
svayaṃ bandhed bandayed vāpi svayaṃ vāpi parasya vā // iti
sarvaśuddha iti prokte svato vāpi parasya vā /
strīsaṅgādyās tu saṃyogā na mokṣaṃ yānti sarvaśaḥ // iti
sarvalokeṣu caivāgryāḥ pūjāś caiva svayaṃbhuvām // iti
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatasiddhimudrātantram udājahāra //:
sādhayan sidhyate śīghraṃ buddhabodhir api sthirā //
purato vajrasattvaṃ ca siddhiḥ śīghratarā bhavet //
bhāvayan vajrasattvaṃ ca siddhis tu dviguṇā bhavet //
bhāvayaṃl lokanāthaṃ ca siddhis tu dviguṇā bhavet //
bhāvayan vajragarbhaṃ ca siddhis tu dviguṇā bhavet //
baddhvā vai sarvamudrās tu tataḥ sidhyanti tatkṣaṇāt //
sādhayet sarvamudrās tu kāmo 'ham iti bhāvayan /
badhnīyāt sarvamudrās tu siddhiṃ yānti hi tatkṣaṇāt //
padmabimbaṃ svam ātmānaṃ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā /
hṛdy ūrṇāyāṃ gale mūrdhni sthāpya buddhair adhiṣṭhyate //
hṛdy ūrṇāyāṃ tathā kaṇṭhe mūrdhni sthāpyādhiṣṭhyate //
kṛtvā tu vajraratnety abhiṣikto jinair bhavet //
samārabhya catuḥpārśve mālayā tv abhiṣicyati // iti
japan vai mantravidyās tu śīghraṃ siddhim avāpnute //
rāgāt tvam asi saṃbhūtaḥ krodho 'ham iti bhāvayan /
hṛnmudrāmantravidyās tu samādhayaṃs tu sarvago bhavet //
pūrvaṃ dhūpādibhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tu susamāhitaḥ /
tatas tu siddhikāmo vai sādhayan siddhim āpnuyāt // iti
ātmaniryātanādyair vā pūjāṃ kurvaṃs tu sidhyati //
krodhamuṣṭiṃ prakurvan vai śīghraṃ sidhyet kulaṃ mama //
sidhyate maṇikulaṃ sarvaṃ dadan dānāni sidhyati //
caturbhiḥ prātihāryais tu vajraviśvaṃ sa sādhayet //
kāye buddhasamādhis tu svabhijñā saugatī tv iyam /
tasyāḥ suprativedhatvād bauddhīṃ siddhim svāpnuyāt // iti
pañcābhijñaḥ svayaṃ bhūtvā parāṃ siddhim avāpnuyāt // iti
pañcābhijñaḥ svayaṃ bhūtvā śuddhāṃ siddhim avāpnuyāt //
pañcābhijñaḥ svayaṃ bhūtvā sarvasiddhir varā bhavet //
buddhabodhir iyaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayan siddhim āpnuyāt //
mahābodhir iyaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayan siddhim āpnuyāt //
mahābodhir iyaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayan siddhim āpnuyāt //
mahābodhir iyaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayan siddhim āpnuyāt //
mahābodhir iyaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayan siddhim āpnuyāt //
sattvārthaṃ ca prakurvan vai buddhabodhyarthikaḥ svayam /
yathāviṣaya yāṃ(-vān?) bhūtvā vajrasattvaṃ tu sādhayet /
tac ca buddhārthato yojyam idaṃ buddhānurāgaṇam //
rāgo vai nāvamantavyo viśuddhaḥ sukahdas tathā /
kāmaṃ sevya sukhātmā tu suratas tvam iti bruvan /
rañjed vā rāgayec caiva vinayārthaṃ vaśaṃkaram //
manasā kāyavāgbhyāṃ vā marayan siddhim āpnuyāt //
ātmano duḥkhadānāc ca hūṃkāreṇa tu mārayet // iti
ātmanaś ca visaṃvādān mārayan siddhim āpnuyāt //
dāridryāc caiva sattvānāṃ mārayan siddhim āpnuyāt //
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatarakṣāmudrāsiddhitantram udājahāra //:
iyaṃ rakṣā tu mahatī śāśvatī siddhidā kṣaṇāt //
bhakir vai vajrahūṃkāre rakṣeyaṃ svaparasya vā //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvo bhagavantam etad avocat /:
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇaye bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya sādhukāram adāt //:
sādhu sādhuvajrapāṇe subhāṣitaṃ, parigṛhīto 'smābhir adhiṣṭhitaś ca // iti
atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya, vajrapāṇaye mahābodhisattvāya sādhukārāṇy adadan /:
sādhu te vajradattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te /

div.ab: sarvakulakalpaguhyavidhivistaratantram

lg.l: sattvavajrāṃ hṛdi baddhvā bhāryā me tvam atipriyā /
dṛḍhībhava iti prokte sarvamudrās tu sādhayet //
guhyabhāryam iti prokte sutarāṃ siddhim āpnuyāt //
mārayan sarvabuddhāṃs tu bhayāt siddhiṃ dadanti hi //
svadāraṃ paradāraṃ vā priyāṃ siddhim avāpnute //
samayas tvam iti proktvā rāgayet sarvayoṣitaḥ /
mā virāgaya sattvārthaṃ bruvan buddhān sa rāgayet //
vajriṇo guhyasamayam idaṃ rakṣaṃs tu sidhyati //
hūṃkārais tu viśuddhyarthaṃ samayo hy arthasiddhidaḥ // iti
rāgaḥ śuddhātmanāṃ śuddho hy aśuddhas tīrthyayoginām /
śuddhātmanāṃ tu samayaṃ pālayan siddhim āpnuyāt //
duṣṭānāṃ tu harann arthān samayaḥ siddhido bhavati //
sarvakāryāṇi kurvan vai bauddhīṃ siddhim avāpnute //
yoṣitāṃ vā priyāṇāṃ vā siddhim āpnoty anuttarām iti //
strīkāryaṃ praviśan yonyā vaśīkuryāt tu yoṣitaḥ //
striyāḥ kāye spharet samayaṅ niśceṣṭām api rāgayet //
praviśaṃs tu bhage kruddhaḥ manasā sa tu pātayet //
bhagena praviśan rakṣed api sarvās tu yoṣitaḥ //
bhagena praviśan strīṇām kṣaṇād āviśya natrtati //
praviṣṭvaiva hi tad guhyaṃ brūyād buddhasya tatkṣaṇāt /
bhāryā hy etās tava vibho dadasva mama sarvada //
evaṃ brvaṃs tu sarveṣu kulamudrānayeṣu ca /
surate samayas tvaṃ hoḥ vajrasattvādya siddhyayām //
idaṃ japaṃs tu hṛdayaṃ sādhayet sarvasiddhayaḥ /
taṃ praviṣṭvaiva śīghraṃ hi brūyāt siddhiṃ tu yācayan /
rāgāt tvam asi saṃbhūta evaṃ sarveṣu sidhyati //
maṇḍalāni likhet prājñas taṃ praviṣṭvaiva vāg vadet //
evam uktvā tu sarveṣu maṇḍaleṣu sa sidhyati //
mahāmaṇiklānāṃ tu taṃ pratiṣṭvaiva vāg vadet //
evaṃ brvaṃs tu sarveṣu maṇḍaleṣu praveṣataḥ /
tataḥ prabhoṛti siddhātmā sādhayan siddhayaḥ sadā /
yadā na laghu siddhiḥ syāt sidhyate tattvacodanaiḥ //
satyānuparivartinyā vāksatyaiḥ śāpitā yan na sidhyate //
mahāmudrāṃ tu vai baddhvā yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ /
idaṃ tattvaṃ rahasyaṃ ca vajravācā vaden nayam //
vajrasattvaḥ svayam ahaṃ tvaṃ me bhāryā hṛdi sthitā /
sidhya sidhyādya samaye samayo 'haṃ tvaṃ priyā mama /
budhya budhya mahāsattvi bhāryā me tvam atipriyā /
iti codanayā śīghram anuraktā tu sidhyati //
sarvakarmakarī bhāryā tvaṃ me sidhyādya vajriṇi /
iti codanayā śīghram anuraktā tu sidhyati //
vijñāya śraddadhac chrāddho duḥsādhyo 'pi hi sidhyati //
māraṇaṃ samayaṃ tv agram idaṃ vijñāya sidhyati //
mahābhūtoḍbhavaṃ sarvaṃ kathaṃ tv aśucir udyate /
strīprasaṅgāt tu ratnānāṃ saṃcayaḥ kriyate yadā /
striyo hy anuttaraṃ ratnam iti cintya sa sidhyati //
tat pariṣvaṅgasaukhyaṃ tu niryātya hi sa sidhyati //
lokeśvaram ahaṃ bhāvya priyāvaktraṃ nirīkṣan vai /
tan nirīkṣaṇasaukhyaṃ tu niryātya hi sa sidhyati //
striyaṃ pariṣvajya pūjāyāṃ vibhūṣitaṃ niryātya sidhyati //
ramayan paradārāṇi yathākaś cin na vedayet /
bhāvayan buddham ātmānaṃ pūjayā siddhim āpnuyāt //
nānyad asti hi teneyaṃ guhyapūjā niruttarā //
yac cittaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ dṛḍhatvāt sattva ucyate /
sa eva bhagavān sattvo vajrakāmas tathāgataḥ //
sa eva bhagavān sattvo vajrasattvo hṛdi sthitaḥ /
ratnas tu racanād uktaḥ sūryas tejovidhānataḥ /
ketuḥ samucchrayaḥ proktaḥ smito hāsas tu kīrtitaḥ //
cakro maṇḍalayogāt tu vāglāpāj japa ucyate //
yathā hi bhagavān śaśvan vajrasattvas tu sarvagaḥ /
tathā vajraṃ tu cihnādi bhāvayann iti sidhyati //
yathā hi samayais tīvraiḥ kaś cid bandho bhavej janaḥ /
nātikramanty ā maraṇād iti vijñāya sidhyati //
ayaṃ bandha iti jñātvā dharmam asya prasidhyati //
anatikramaṇīyā hi vajrājñā karma bhūri ca /
ājñāvatas tu tat karma vijñāya laghusidhyati //
atha khalu bhagavān vajrapāṇiṃ mahābodhisattvam evam āha //:
idam api mayā bhagavan parigṛhītam adhiṣṭhitaṃ ceti //
atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya, vajrapāṇaye sarvatathāgatādhipataye sādhukārāṇy adaduḥ //
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te /
buddhānusmṛtimān bhūtvā vajra vajra iti bruvan /
hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūm iti procya siddhim āpnoty anuttarām //
śudhya śudhya iti procya hy uttamāṃ siddhim āpnuyāt //
sidhya sidhya iti procya hy arthasiddhiḥ parā bhavet //
akāras tena dharmāṇām anutpāda iti smṛtaḥ //
sarvatāthāgataṃ tattvam idaṃ sūtraṃ tu śaraddadhan /
bhāvayann idam ādyaṃ tu dharmeṇāśu prasidhyati //
imaṃ maṇikule dharmaṃ bhāvayann āśu sidhyati //
idaṃ bhāvayamānas tu parāṃ siddhim avāpnuyāt // iti
purataḥ prakāśayen mudrāḥ siddhir āsāṃ suguhyataḥ //
tadā khe dhāvataḥ śubhās tatrākārāḥ sa paśyati //
tadā jānīta matimān buddhacakṣur idaṃ mama /
yāvanto bhāvā vidyante sthāvarā jaṅgamās tathā /
teṣāṃ ca pratibimbāni paśyati khe pradhāvataḥ //
jānan vai pūjayā sddhim āpnoty anuttarām //
tān dṛṣṭvā na hi bidhyeta mudrās tā vajrasaṃbhavāḥ /
śvetān raktān sitān pītān yadā paśyanti maṇḍalān /
yadā tu paśyate khe tu khacakṣuḥ sidhyate sadā //
kāmādyāḥ sarvasaukhyā me sadaiva hṛdaye sthitāḥ /
aho sattvārthatā nāma virāgo yatra deśayate //
bhāvayan pūjayed buddhān uttamāṃ siddhim āpnuyāt //
saṃlikhya tu bhagākāraṃ kuḍye meḍhraṃ samutthitam /
yāṃ striyaṃ cintayed vṛddhaṃ kuryāt sāsya vaśībhavet //
nihatya cakṣurdeśe tu samākarṣet striyo varāḥ //
padmaṃ gṛhya karābhyāṃ tu nirīkṣan rāgaśuddhitām /
vajradṛṣṭyā tu sa strīṇāṃ gamayed antitas tathā //
pūjākarmavidhiṃ yojya yad yat kāryaṃ tu cintayet /
tat tad vijñāpya mudrāṃ tu sādhayeta vicakṣaṇaḥ //
yatkāryaṃ vadate tat tu śīghraṃ siddhim avāpnuyāt //
yat kiñcit cintayet prājñaḥ sa śīghraṃ siddhim eṣyati //
yat kāryaṃ cintayet prājñaḥ tat sarvaṃ śīghram āpnuyāt //
yat kāryaṃ cintayet prājñaḥ tat sarvaṃ sidhyati kṣaṇāt //
sattvo hi sarvapratyātmā mamāpy ātmani saṃsthitaḥ /
ity adhiṣṭhāya sattvo 'ham ahaṃkāreṇa bhāvayan sidhyati //
yathā sattvas tathā mudrā yathā mudrās tathā hy aham /
vāṅmudrāṇāṃ tu tāḥ sarvāḥ mahāsattvasamādhir hi //
atha bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya,
bhagavate sarvatathāgatacakravarine vajrapāṇaye mahābodhisattvāya sādhukārāṇy adaduḥ //:
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te /
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisatt imāṃ gāthām abhāṣat //:
durdṛṣṭāṃ viraktānām idaṃ guhyaṃ na yugyate /
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api sarvatathāgatpacāravidhivistaram abhāṣat //:
mahāmaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūpapuṣpadīpagandhapūjāṃ mudrābhiḥ kṛtvā tato vajravācā jāpam ārabhet //
yathāsthānasthitaś caturmāsaṃ catuḥsaṃdhyaṃ dhūpādibhir yathāvat pūjāṃ kṛtvā,

div.ab: tato 'viraktaḥ sarvakāmaguṇeṣu sarvāhāraḥ sarvakāmopabhogī hṛdayārthataḥ svam ātmānaṃ buddhabimbaṃ purato vāṅmātreṇāpi bhāvayan yathākāmakaraṇīyatayāṣṭaśataṃ vajravācā jāpann āśu prasidhyati.

lg.l: tataḥ icchantena paṭe bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ madhye lekhayet /
tasya caturmāhāsattvamaṇḍalayogena yathābhirucitavarṇābharaṇā mahāsattvāś candramaṇḍalapratiṣṭhitā lekhyāḥ koṇabhāgeṣu kuladevya iti //
tataḥ paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, yathāvaj japayogena tāvaj japed yāvan māsacatuṣṭayam /
paṭasyāgrato vajravācā śatasahasraṃ yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā yathāvad bandhan muñcaṃś ca japet //
tato 'nte sakalāṃ rātrim aviśramataḥ kaṃ cit kālaṃ muñcan yathavac ca bandhan japet /
tato mudrā jvalaty āviśaty uttiṣṭhati vācaṃ muñcati // iti
sarvamudrāś ca baddhamātrā yathāvat sarvakarmāṇi kurvanti /
tena sūkṣmavajrād ārabhya, yaṃ samādhiṃ abhirocet taṃ hṛdayayogato 'bhyaset tāvad yāvac caturmāsam /
tato 'nte sakalāṃ rātriṃ paryaṅkabaddhaḥ samāpannaḥ sthātavyaḥ. tetathāgatādyāḥ sarvasiddhaya āmukhībhavati //

div.ab: tato yādṛśy abhirucis tādṛśīsiddhiḥ
tataḥ sarvakarmasiddhim avāpntoti

lg.l: āveśayet ca candanena sugandhena spṛṣṭāspṛṣṭavajrāṅkuśaśarahastaratnasūryadhvajadantapaṅkutipadmakhaḍgacakrajihvāsarvavajrakavacadaṃṣṭrāmuṣṭimudrādīni sarvabhāvāny āveśayati sakṛj japtena /
māyākarma ca mayūrapattrapicchake vajrān viddhvā bandhayet /
tatas taṃ mayūrāṅgapicchakaṃ sattvavajrimudrayāvapīḍya tāvaj japed yāvat sarvatathāgatamudrāviśati //
tataś ca picchakān nānādyāni rūpāṇi paśyati //
tataḥ prabhṛti tena picchakena sarvarūpāṇi vidhivad darśayati /
daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatāḥ sasarṣanmaṇḍalāḥ samārasenādharṣaṇādibuddharddhivikurvitāni kurvanto darśayati /
vaśīkaraṇaṃ kartukāmaḥ sarvatathāgatasattvavajrīmudrāṃ baddhvā tāvaj japed yāvat sā mudrā jvalati //
tataḥ prabhṛti mudrābandhena sarvatathāgatān apy ārāgayati vaśīkaroti kiṃ punaru anyān sattvān //
atha laukikottamasiddhayaḥ sādhayitukāmena tenādita eva tathaiva japatā māsam ekam aṣṭasāhasrikeṇa japena,
tathaiva sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet tāvad yāvan mudrā jvalati //
tataḥ prabhṛti mudrābandhena laukikasiddhividyādharasiddhīnām ekatarā bhavati //
atha sādhayitum icchantena yathāvat paṭaḥ śeśrāpayitavyaḥ /
māsam ekaṃ sarvakāmabhojī yathākāmakaraṇīyatayāṣṭasāhasrikeṇa jāpena catuḥsaṃdhyā vajravācā japet /
tāvad yāvan māsānte paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
tāvaj japed yāvat tasmān mudrābandhād dhūṃkāraśabda udbilasṛtaḥ /
tataḥ prabhāte maheśvarādayo devādhipatayaḥ sagaṇaparivārāḥ puraḥ sthitvājñāṃ mārgayanti //

div.ab: tato vidyādhareṇaivaṃ vaktavyam

lg.l: yadāhaṃ brūyām ``āgacchatedaṃ kuruta'', tadā bhavadbhir āgatya mamājñā kāryā // iti
yathecchayā ca muhūrtamātreṇa sakalaṃ tribhuvanam ājñāpayan bhramati /
punar apy eti ca nigrahānugrahaṃ kurvan,
divyāni trilokabhogāni copabhuñjan, yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā savasurādhipatiyoṣitādyāḥ sarvayoṣita ārāgayitvopabhuñjati /
na ca tasya kaś cit kiṃ cic chaknoti kartum /
hūṃkāreṇa ca sarvaduṣṭadevādīn pātayan, tato 'ntarakalpasahasrāṇi jīvati /
māsānte vajrahūṃkārasamayamudraṃ baddhvā sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet /

div.ab: tato yathāvan mudrābandhena hūṃkāraprayuktenākāśagamanaviśvasaṃdarśanāntardhānamāyāsaṃdarśanasarvāveśanākarṣaṇavaśīkaraṇasarvatuṣṭisaṃjananasarvaratnābhiharaṇamahātejojvālāsaṃdarśanaratnavṛṣṭisaṃdarśanamahāṭṭahāsapramuñcanasarvasattvasaṃśodhanachindanabhindanartucakraparivartanayathāvattattvollāpanasarvakarmapravartanarakṣājambhanastambhatrāsanamāraṇasarvasattvamudraṇakāmaratikriyāpravartanābhiṣekasarvabhāvagāyāpananṛtyāpanāhvāpanapraveśanasphoṭanāveśanādīni sarvakarmāṇi karoti

lg.l: tena vajrahūṃkārasamādhim abhyasatā tathaiva jāpayogena māsam ekaṃ sādhayitavyam /
tato 'nte tenaiva samādhinā sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet /
tāvad yāvat prabhāte pañcābhijño bhūtvā sarvasattvānugrahanigrahakṣamo bhavati
tena tathaiva japatā māsam ekaṃ sādhayitavyam //
sakṛd uccāritena manīṣitayā rakṣādīni sarvakarmāṇi karoti //
paṭe bhagavantaḥ sarvajagadvinayādyāḥ kartavyās tasya sarvapārśveṣu caturmaṇḍalayogena mahāsattvacatuṣṭayaḥ kāryante ca devyaḥ /
tataḥ sa eva japavidhivistaro māsānte sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet /
tena tathaiva padmavajrimudrābandhaṃ kṛtvā yathāvan muñcyāṣṭasāharikeṇa japena catuḥsaṃdhyaṃ japet /
tena tathaiva māsānte sakalāṃ rātriṃ yathābhirucitena samādhinā japo dātavyaḥ /
tathaiva japya māsānte sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet /
tatrādita eva sarvatathāgatapraṇāmacatuṣṭayaṃ kṛtvā śatasahasraṃ japet /
tatas tathiava paṭe bhagavantaṃ sarvārthasiddhiṃ caturmudrāmaṇḍalayogena likhet /
tatas tathaiva pūjāṃ kṛtvā tathaiva sādhayet /
tataḥ prabhāte bhagavān sarvatathāgatābhiṣekaratna ākāśagarbho bodhisattva āgatyābhiṣekaṃ dadāti /
tena tathaiva dharmavajriprayogeṇa vajraratnamudrā yathāvat sādhyā sarvāśākarmakarī bhavati /
imaṃ samādhiṃ catuḥsaṃdhyaṃ bhāvya japed yathopari /
tato māsānte tenaiva samādhinā sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet /
tena tathaiva japatā māsānte sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet /
tataḥ prabhāte bhagavān ākāśagarbhaḥ sarvārthasādhako bhavatīti /
hṛdayamanīṣitāni sarvatathāgatānāṃ sidhyantām ity uccārya hṛdayaṃ yathābhirucito japya sādhanavidhiḥ kartavya iti //
sarvamudrā me priyā bhavantv ity uktvā samayamudrāṃ baddhvā yathābhirucito yathāśaktyā japet /
sarvatathāgatasamādhayo me ājāyantām ity ukutvā mantraṃ yathābhirucito japet /
avidyāndhā bateme sattvāḥ sarvatathāgatāś ca vidyādhigamasaṃvarabhūtā ity uktvā vidyāṃ yathābhirucito japya sādhanam āvahet //
yasya sattvasya hṛn mudrāṃ mantraṃ vidyāṃ tu sādhayet /
jāpārthatas tam ātmānaṃ sattvaṃ vā sādhya sidhyati //
tad yatha, arthaniṣpattisiddhiḥ, ṛddhisiddhiḥ, vidyādharatvam, mahāsiddhiś ceti //
yatra nidhiśaṅkā bhavet tatra mudrāṃ baddhvā svasamādhinā tan nidhisthānaṃ vajradṛṣṭyā nrīkṣayet /
yadi vajrākāramūrtiścutaṃ paśyati tato jñātavyaṃ nidhir atrāstīti //
yāṃ mudrāṃ sādhayed vajrasddhir ity uktvā rddhisiddhiś caturvidhā bhavati /
ākāśagāmī ca yojanasahasramūrdhnam utpataty adhastāc ca gacchaty āgacchati //
sarvadikṣu ca yojanasahasrād adhvena manobhirucitāḥ sarvastriyo 'ṅge samutkṣipyānayati //
na cāsya kaścit kiṃ cic chaknoti kartum /
yad vajreṇāpy adhṛṣyo bhavati, kiṃ punar apy anyaiḥ //

div.ab: daśapuruṣasahasrabalī, nityārogyavān, nityaṃ sarvakāmopabhojī, sadā yauvano, divyarūpī, sarvatathāgatān savajrasattvān paśyan pūjayaṃś cānuttaravajrasiddhiś catvāri varṣasahasrāṇi jīvati
sarvasukhāni paribhuñjan dviraṣṭavarṣavapur ākuñcitakuṇḍalakeśadhārimahāvajravidyādharaḥ sarvatathāgatān savajrasattvān paśyan mahākalpasthāyī bhavati

lg.l: svamudrāsattvarūpī bhavaty ekakṣaṇena daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu viśvarūpī viśvakriyāpravartakaḥ
sarvatathāgatān savajrasattvān dṛṣṭvā sarvākāravaropetābhiḥ sarvatathāgatapūjābhiḥ saṃpūjyāśeṣānavaśeṣasattvārthaṃ ca kṛtvā punar apy āyāti //

div.ab: sarvalokadhātusarvakāmasarvasukhasaumanasyāni sarvākāravaropetāny upabhuñjan vajrasattvasamo mahābodhisattvo 'śeṣānavaśeṣamahākalpāyur bhavati

lg.l: *hūṃkārahuṃkāra-, ed.prayuktamātre maheśvarādayaḥ sarvatrailokyādhipatayaḥ saparivārāḥ sādhakasya purata. āgatyājñāvaśyavidheyā bhavanti //
duṣṭadevādayaś ca sarvasattvān *hūṃkāreṇa huṃkāreṇa, ed. damayati /

div.ab: sarvatathāgatavajra*hūṃ-huṃ, ed.kārarūpī sakalatrilokam ājñayā vartayan sarvatathāgatān savajrasattvān paśyann ārāgayaṃś ca varṣasahasraṃ jīvati

lg.l: tasya tasya siddhasya caturvidham abhiṣeko bhavati /
tatra vajrābhiṣeke labdhe sarvatathāgatānāṃ vajradharo bhavati /

div.ab: tatreyaṃ sukhasaumanasya siddhir yad uta guhyapūjābhir nityaṃ sarvatathāgatapūjāṃ kurvan sarvatathāgatasarvasukhasaumanasya siddhim avāpnoti
svaṃ padmasamādhinā padmaṃ hasena gṛhya sādhayan lokeśvararūpī sarvākāravaropetaś caturvarṣasahasraṃ jīvati

lg.l: yad uta svābhiṣekaniryātanapradīpadānapāramitāpāripūrir yathāśaktyā ratnasādhanaṃ cety ābhiḥ siddhibhiḥ sarvatathāgatān pūjayann acirāt sidhyati
atha sarvakalpopāyasiddhitantram anuvyākhyasyāmīty āha bhagavān anādisattvaḥ //
yathā vineyo loko hi tādṛśīsiddhir iṣyate /
upāyas tatra mudrā hi sarvasiddhipradaṃ mahat //
upāyas tatra tv anudāryaṃ sarvasiddhipradaṃ varam //
atha sarvakalpapuṇyasiddhitantram anuvyākhyāsyāmīty āha bhagavān sarvatathāgataḥ //
rakṣaṃs tu samayaṃ guhyaṃ mahāpuṇyam avāpnute /
dānam agryaṃ hi puṇyānāṃ dadan puṇyam avāpnute /

div.ab: iti.

lg.l: prajñā nairvedhikī nāma samāsiddhir iti kīrtitā /
tayā tu mudrāḥ sidhyante bhāvayan sidhyati kṣaṇāt //
prajñayā bhāvayann evam āśu siddhir dhruvā bhavet //
atha sarvakalpasaṃbhārasiddhitantram anuvyākhyasyāmīty āha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ //
kuśalānāṃ tu dharmāṇāṃ tataḥ sidhyati saṃbhṛtaḥ //
sa eva bhagavān sattvaḥ sarvacittaḥ svayaṃprabhuḥ /
vajrasattvā iti khyātas tasmin vajre pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
niṣkramya hṛdayād viśvo viśvarūpo bhavaty api //
sarvadhāturajaḥsaṃkhyāḥ sa eva tu jino bhavet /
tebhyo vai vajrakāyebhyo vajrasattvas tu saṃbhavet //
cihnebhyas tu mahāsattvās tebhyaḥ sarvam idaṃ nayam //
ya idaṃ śṛṇuyāt kaścic chraddhadhed dhārayed dhṛdi /
bhāvayec ca sadā tuṣṭaḥ sa śīghraṃ siddhim āpnuyāt //
buddhānām avikalpaṃ tu jñānaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
avikalpāt tato jñānāt kalpanāt kalpaḥ udyate //
yam ālikhya hi kalpante vidhayaḥ kalpasiddhidaḥ /
rāgo vikalpasaṃbhūtaḥ sa ca padme pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
tatas tu kalpasthāyinyaḥ siddhayaḥ sa bhavanti hi //
maṇayo hy avikalpās tu prabhāvaiḥ susamucchritāḥ /
evaṃ tu siddhayo divyāḥ saṃbhavanty avikalpitāḥ //
anatikramaṇīyo hi durbhedyo guhya eva ca /
vidyate vedanā siddhis tena vidyā prakīrtitā //
hṛdayaṃ jāpya vijñeyam ātmano vā parasya vā /
bhavyaṃ bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti ca //
mudrām ekatarāṃ baddhvā yathāvad vidhim ātmanaḥ /
kṛtvā nirīkṣel lokaṃ tu sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ yathopari //
sakṛd uccārayan mantraṃ brūyāj jihvāṃ svakīṃ tu yaḥ /
bhavyaṃ bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ satyam āvahet //
sakṛd uccārya vidyāṃ tu vedayan manasā sa tu /

div.ab: iti.

lg.l: yathā tathābhiṣaṇṇās tu paryaṅkena tu sādhayet /
utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā caṅkraman vā yathā tathā /
anucchvāsam ivocchvāsaṃ or ucchvasan vā anucchvāsaṃ
jāpate vinayaiś cāpi sarvam āśu prasidhyati //
yathā padmam aliptaṃ tu vāsadoṣaiḥ surāgavān /
tathā me rāgadoṣais tu bhave rāgaḥ sa sidhyati //
ratnavarṣāṇi varṣayaṃ siddhaḥ sann āśu sidhyati //
utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā bhraman vāpi yathā tathā /
yathā tathā sthitaś caiva kurvan vāpi yathā tathā /
baddhvā yathā tathā śīghraṃ padmasiddhim avāpnuyāt
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ sarvatathāgatān āhūyaivam āha /
pratipadyata, bhagavantas tathāgatā idaṃ kalpam adhiṣṭhitum iti //
atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya, punar api sādhukārāṇy adaduḥ //
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te /
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva utthāyāsanād anena nāmāṣṭaśatena bhagavantam adhīyeṣa //
vibho mahāvinaya neyārtha vinayāgra namo 'stu te //
mahāvīra pravīrāgrya śaṃbho śaure namo 'stu te //
sarvātmaka mune śuddha dharmarāja namo 'stu te //
nāmāṣṭaśatakaṃ caitad yaḥ kaścic chṛṇuyāt sakṛt /
paṭhed vā bhāvayed vāpi sarvabuddhatvam āpnuyāt //
atha bhagavān vairocanaḥ sarvatathāgatādhipateḥ pratijñāvacanam upaśrutya sarvatathāgatān āhūyaivam āha //
pratipadyata, bhagavantas tathāgatāḥ, samājaṃ punar āgantum
atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamyemāṃ gāthām abhāṣanta //:
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ purataḥ spharya yāvat sarva[paramāṇurajomaṇḍaleṣu bhagavāñ chākyamuni tathāgato dharmacakraṃ pravartayām āsa //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṃ gāthām abhāṣat /
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre tathaiva sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāvat sarvaparamāṇurajomaṇḍaleṣu bhagavān vajradhātus tathāgato vajradhātvādīni sarvavajracakrāṇi pravartayām āsa //
atha trilokavijayo mahābodhisattvas tasmin samaye imāṃ gāthām abhāṣat //
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre tathaiva sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāvat sarvaparamāṇurajomaṇḍaleṣu bhagavāṃs trilokavijayas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgatakrodhacakraṃ pravartayām āsa //
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre tathaiva sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāvat sarvaparamāṇurajomaṇḍaleṣu bhagavān dharmarājas tathāgataḥ padmacakraṃ pravartayām āsa //

athāsmin bāṣitamātre ye sarvabuddhakṣetreṣv antarasthāḥ sarvasattvāḥ sūkṣmā vā sthūlā vā, te sarve tathāgataṃ sumerugirimūrdhni vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgāre sarvatathāgatāsananiṣaṇṇaṃ vajradhātvādīni cakrāṇi pravartayantam sarvato drākṣur iti //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthām abhāṣat //
punar api bhagavān sarvatathāgathān āhūyaivam āha //
pratipadyata bhagavantas tathāgatāḥ, punaḥ samājam āpattum
atha bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āga[mya bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭā iti //
atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajram ātmānam avabudhya, vajrapāṇim evam āha //
kulaputra tvam api mama hṛdaye sarvatathāgatasarvavajrakulasarvamaṇḍalasarvatathāgatahṛdayeṣu samavapraveśasva
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatānujñāta imāṃ gāthām abhāṣat //
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre yāvantas tathāgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti /
te tathāgatā ekaikaśo 'pi sarvalokadhātuparamaṇurajaḥsamāḥ spharaṇakāyāḥ bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭāḥ //

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatasya ca bhagavataś ca vairocanasya sarvakāyeṣu sarvavākpravartanasthāneṣu sarvacittasaṃtatipravāheṣu sarvavajranayeṣu sarvāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu sarvasthāneṣu sarvalakṣaṇeṣu sarvānuvyañjaneṣu sarvaromakūpeṣu sarvaparamāṇurajomaṇḍaleṣu ca hṛdayeṣu ca praviṣṭvā sthita iti //

atha bhagavān acirābhisaṃbuddhaḥ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajraḥ sarvatathāgatakāyam ātmānam avabudhya, tasmāt sumerugirimūrdhnād yena bodhimaṇḍalaṃ tenopetya, bhagavato bodhivṛkṣasyādhastāt lokānuvartanatayā punas tṛṇāni gṛhyedam udānam udānayām āsa //
yad vineyavaśād dhīrās tīrthyadṛṣṭyā sthihanti hi //
atha kāmāvacarā devā bhagavantas tattvam ajānanto 'brūvan /
kiṃ bho śaraṇaivaṃ tīvrāṇy evaṃ kaṭukāni bodhyarthaṃ duḥkhāny utsahasi //
atha bhagavāṃs tāni tṛṇāny āstīryopaviṣṭvā tān devān evam āha /
atha kāmāvacarā devā bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ajānanto, yena śakro devānām indras tenopajagmuḥ /
upetya śakraṃ devānām indram idaṃ vṛttāntam ārocayām āsuḥ
atha śakrodevānām indraḥ sarvakāmavacaradevasaṃghaparivāro rūpāvacarādhipatiṃ mahābrahmaṇam idam eva vṛttāntam ārocayām āsa //
atha mahābrahmā sarvakāmāvacararūpāvacaradevasahitas trilokādhipatim īśvaraṃ taṃ vṛttāntam ārocayām āsa //
tato maheśvaras trilokādhipatir nārāyaṇādīn sarvadevādhipatīn evam āha /
pratipadyata mārṣās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃ buddho lokānuvartanaṃ kṛtvā punar anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ darśayiṣyati //
mā marṣā evaṃ vidyur `na tathāgato mānuṣo bhavati' /
evā eva tathāgatāḥ bhaviṣyanti, devasaṃpattaye ghaṭayeyuḥ /
tat sādhu pratipadyata tatra pūjanāya gantum /
atha maheśvarādisarvadevādhipatayo yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bhagavān bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇas tenopajagmuḥ /
upetya ca bhagavātaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantam evam ūcuḥ /
pratipadyasva, bhagavann asmākam anukampām upādāyāsmāt tṛṣṇasaṃstarād utthāya divyeṣv āsaneṣu niṣadyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum
na vayaṃ bhagavan samarthā bodhiṃ dātum /
yadi vayaṃ samarthā bhavemas tadātmanaivābhisaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyemahi
atha bhagavān idam evārtham uddīpayan bhūyasyā mātrayemāṃ gāthām abhāṣat //
na sā rūpī na cārūpī na satyam na mṛṣā śuci /
buddhabodhir idaṃ jñānam avabudhya jino bhavet //

div.ab: iti

lg.l: atha te devādhipatayo muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ bhāvena tasthuḥ //
atha bhagavāṃs tatas tṛṇāsanād utthāya tān devān evam āha /
atha bhagavāṃs tasminn evāsane niṣadyemāṃ gāthām abhāṣat //
vajraṃ sattve dṛḍhīkṛtvā buddham ātmā tu bhāvaya //

atha bhagavān rātrau prabhātāyāṃ lokānuvartanatayā mārāṃ jitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyaśeṣānavaśeṣasarvasattvadhātuhitopakāraṃ svahṛdayāvasthitam āryavajrapāṇim anena nāmāṣṭaśatenābhiṣṭauti //
vandyo mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca satkartavyas tathāgataiḥ /
tvām āsādya jināḥ sarve buddhabodhisattvāś ca sauriṇaḥ /
namas te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya te namaḥ /
namas te vajradharmāya namas te vajrakarmaṇe //
tvām abhiṣṭutya nāmāryaiḥ praṇamya ca subhāvataḥ /
yat puṇyaṃ tena sarvo hi buddhabodhim avāpnuyāt //
sakṛd vāraṃ subhaktiś ca sarvabuddhatvam āpnuyāt //
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas taiḥ sarvatathāgataiḥ sahaikakaṇṭhena sādhukārāṇy anuprādāyi //
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te /
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe //

div.ab: iti.

lg.l: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanasaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ sahāryabodhisattvaiḥ svahṛdayāvasthitair bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
